GSP33ramvaspu:2: paraṃ brahmaivājñaṃ bhramaparigataṃ saṃsarati tatparopādhyālīḍhaṃ vivaśamaśubhasyāspadam iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:3: śrutinyāyāpetaṃ jagati vitataṃ mohanam idaṃ tamo yenāpāstaṃ sa hi vijayate yāmunamuniḥ //(2) (3)
GSP33ramvaspu:11: ya ātmani tiṣṭhann ātmano 'ntaro yam ātmā na veda yasyātmā śarīraṃ ya ātmānam antaro yamayati sa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:12: eṣa sarvabhūtāntarātmāpahatapāpmā divyo deva eko nārāyaṇaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:13: tam etaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena dānena tapasānāśakena /
GSP33ramvaspu:15: tam evaṃ vidvān amṛta iha bhavati nānyaḥ panthā ayanāya vidyata ityādikam / (5)
GSP33ramvaspu:17: tasyaitasya karmakṛtadevādibhede 'padhvaste svarūpabhedo vācām agocaraḥ svasaṃvedyaḥ,
GSP33ramvaspu:27: tasya vaibhavapratipādanaparāṇām eṣāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyādīnāṃ vivaraṇe pravṛttāḥ kecana nirviśeṣajñānamātram eva brahma,
GSP33ramvaspu:28: tac ca nityamuktasvaprakāśasvabhāvam api tat tvam asy ādisāmānādhikaraṇyāvagatajīvāikyaṃ,
GSP33ramvaspu:32: kaścin mukta ity iyam avasthā na vidyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:33: itaḥ pūrvaṃ kecana muktā ity ayam artho mithyā /
GSP33ramvaspu:36: ācāryo jñānasyopadeṣṭā mithyā śāstraṃ ca mithyā śāstrapramātā ca mithyā śāstrajanyaṃ jñānaṃ ca mithyā etat sarvaṃ mithyābhūtenaiva śāstreṇāvagamyata iti varṇayanti / (8)
GSP33ramvaspu:38: kenacid upādhiviśeṣeṇa saṃbaddhaṃ badhyate mucyate ca nānāvidhamalarūpapariṇāmāspadaṃ ceti vyavasthitāḥ / (9)
GSP33ramvaspu:42: tatra prathamapakṣasya śrutyarthaparyālocanaparā duṣparihārān doṣān udāharanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:44: bahu syāṃ prajāyeyetyārabhya sanmūlāḥ somyemāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ sadāyatanāḥ satpratiṣṭhā
GSP33ramvaspu:48: atha syāt upakrame 'py ekavijñānena sarvavijñānamukhena kāraṇasyaiva satyatāṃ pratijñāya
GSP33ramvaspu:49: tasya kāraṇabhūtasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ satyatāṃ vikārajātasyāsatyatāṃ mṛddṛṣṭāntena darśayitvā
GSP33ramvaspu:50: satyabhūtasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ekam evādvitīyam iti sajātīyavijātīyanikhilabhedanirasanena
GSP33ramvaspu:52: etac chodhakāni prakaraṇāntaragatavākyāny api satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahma,
GSP33ramvaspu:56: ekatve 'pi vastunaḥ sarvaviśeṣapratyanīkatopasthāpanena sarvapadānām arthavattvād iti / (12)
GSP33ramvaspu:58: ekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ sarvasya mithyātve sarvasya jñātavyasyābhāvān na setsyati /
GSP33ramvaspu:60: api tv ekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ sarvasya tadātmakatvenaiva satyatve sidhyati / (13)
GSP33ramvaspu:61: ayam arthaḥ śvetaketuṃ pratyāha stabdho 'sy uta tam ādeśam aprākṣya iti paripūrṇa iva lakṣyase tān ācāryān prati tam apy ādeśaṃ pṛṣṭavān asīti
GSP33ramvaspu:64: etasya vā akṣarasya gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhata ity ādibhir aikyarthyāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:65: tathā ca mānavaṃ vacaḥ praśāsitāraṃ sarveṣām ityādi /
GSP33ramvaspu:66: atrāpy ekam eveti jagadupādānatāṃ pratipādyādvitīyapadenādhiṣṭhātaranivāraṇād asyaivādhiṣṭhātṛtvam api pratipādyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:67: atas taṃ praśāsitāraṃ jagadupādānabhūtam api pṛṣṭavān asi yena śrutena matena vijñātenāśrutam amatam avijñānaṃ śrutaṃ mataṃ vijñātaṃ bhavatīty uktaṃ syāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:68: nikhilajagadudayavibhavavilayādikāraṇabhūtaṃ sarvajñatvasatyakāmatvasatyasaṃkalpatvaparimitodāraguṇagaṇasāgaraṃ kiṃ brahmāpi tvayā śrutam iti hārdo bhāvaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:69: tasya nikhilakāraṇatayā kāraṇam eva nānāsaṃsthānaviśeṣasaṃsthitaṃ kāryam ity ucyata
GSP33ramvaspu:71: vijñātaṃ bhavatīti hṛdi nidhāya yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavaty amataṃ matam avijñātaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:72: vijñātaṃ syād iti putraṃ prati pṛṣṭavān pitā /
GSP33ramvaspu:73: tad etatsakalasya vastujātasyaikakāraṇatvaṃ pitṛhṛdi nihitam ajānan putraḥ parasparavilakṣaṇeṣu
GSP33ramvaspu:74: vastuṣv anyasya jñānena tadanyavijñānasyāghaṭamānatāṃ buddhvā paricodayati kathaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:76: paricoditaḥ punas tad eva hṛdi nihitaṃ jñānānandāmalatvaikasvarūpam aparicchedyamāhātmyaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:80: tajjñānenāsya nikhilasya jñātatāṃ bruvaṃl lokadṛṣṭaṃ kāryakāraṇayor ananyatvaṃ darśayituṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:81: dṛṣṭāntam āha yathā somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍena sarvaṃ mṛnmayaṃ vijñātaṃ syād vācārambhaṇaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:82: vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttikety eva satyam iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:84: nānānāmadheyam api mṛttikāsaṃsthānaviśeṣatvān mṛddravyam evettham avasthitaṃ na vastvantaram iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:85: yathā mṛtpiṇḍavijñānena tatsaṃsthānaviśeṣarūpam ghaṭaśarāvādi sarvaṃ jñātam eva bhavatītyarthaḥ / (16)
GSP33ramvaspu:86: tataḥ kṛtsnasya jagato brahmaikakāraṇatām ajānan putraḥ pṛcchati bhagavāṃs tv eva me tad bravītv iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:87: tataḥ sarvajñaṃ sarvaśakti brahmaiva sarvakāraṇam ity upadiśan sa hovāca sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ekam evādvitīyam iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:90: tasmin kāle jagataḥ sadātmakatāṃ sad eveti pratipādya,
GSP33ramvaspu:91: tatsṛṣṭikāle 'py aviśiṣṭam iti kṛtvaikam eveti sadāpannasya jagatas tadānīm avibhaktanāmarūpatāṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:92: pratipādya tatpratipādanenaiva sato jagadupādānatvaṃ pratipāditam iti svavyatiriktanimittakāraṇam
GSP33ramvaspu:94: tam ādeśam prākṣyo yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavatītyādāv eva praśāstitaiva jagadupādānam iti hṛdi nihitam idānīm abhivyaktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:95: svayam eva jagadupādānaṃ jagannimittaṃ ca sat tad aikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti /
GSP33ramvaspu:96: tad etacchabdavācyaṃ paraṃ brahma sarvajñaṃ sarvaśakti satyasaṅkalpam avāptasamastakāmam
GSP33ramvaspu:97: api līlārthaṃ vicitrānantacidacinmiśrajagadrūpeṇāham eva bahu syāṃ tadarthaṃ prajāyeyeti
GSP33ramvaspu:98: svayam eva saṃkalpya svāṃśaikadeśād eva viyadādibhūtāni sṛṣṭvā punar api saiva sacchabdābhihitā
GSP33ramvaspu:99: parā devataivam aikṣata hantāham imās tisro devatā anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇīti /
GSP33ramvaspu:100: anena jīvenātmaneti jīvasya brahmātmakatvaṃ pratipādya brahmātmajīvānupraveśād eva
GSP33ramvaspu:101: kṛtsnasyācidvastunaḥ padārthatvam evaṃbhūtasyaiva sarvasya vastuno nāmabhāktvam iti ca darśayati /
GSP33ramvaspu:102: etaduktaṃ bhavati jīvātmā tu brahmaṇaḥ śarīratayā prakāratvād brahmātmakaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:104: evaṃbhūtasya jīvasya śarīratayā prakārabhūtāni devamanuṣyādisaṃsthānāni vastūnīti brahmātmakāni tāni sarvāṇi /
GSP33ramvaspu:105: ato devo manuṣyo rākṣasaḥ paśur mṛgaḥ pakṣī vṛkṣo latā kāṣṭhaṃ śilā tṛṇaṃ ghaṭaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:106: paṭa ityādayaḥ sarve prakṛtipratyayayogenābhidhāyakatayā prasiddhāḥ śabdā loke tattadvācyatayā
GSP33ramvaspu:109: sarvaṃ ca sanmūlāḥ somyemāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ sadāyatanāḥ satpratiṣṭhā ityādinā vistareṇa
GSP33ramvaspu:110: pratipādya kāryakāraṇabhāvādimukhenāitadātmyam idaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyam iti kṛtsnasya
GSP33ramvaspu:111: jagato brahmātmakatvam eva satyam iti pratipādya kṛtsnasya jagataḥ sa evātmā kṛtsnaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:112: jagat tasya śarīraṃ tasmāt tvaṃśabdavācyam api jīvaprakāraṃ brahmaiveti sarvasya
GSP33ramvaspu:113: brahmātmakatvaṃ pratijñātaṃ tat tvam asīti jīvaviśeṣa upasaṃhṛtam / (19)
GSP33ramvaspu:115: aitadātmyam idaṃ sarvam iti cetanācetanaprapañcam idaṃ sarvam iti nirdiśya tasya prapañcasyaiṣa ātmeti pratipāditaḥ,
GSP33ramvaspu:117: tad idaṃ brahmātmakatvaṃ kim ātmaśarīrabhāvenota svarūpeṇeti vivecanīyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:118: svarūpeṇa ced brahmaṇaḥ satyasaṅkalpādyaḥ tad aikṣata bahu syaṃ prajāyeyety upakramāvagatā bādhitā bhavanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:119: śarīrātmabhāvena ca tad ātmakatvaṃ śrutyantarād viśeṣato 'vagatam antaḥpraviṣṭaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:120: śāstā janānāṃ sarvātmeti praśāsitṛtvarūpātmatvena sarveṣāṃ janānām antaḥpraviṣṭo
GSP33ramvaspu:121: 'taḥ sarvātmā sarveṣāṃ janānām ātmā sarvaṃ cāsya śarīram iti viśeṣato jñāyate brahmātmakatvam /
GSP33ramvaspu:122: ya ātmani tiṣṭhann ātmano 'ntaro yam ātmā na veda yasyātmā śarīraṃ ya ātmānam antaro yamayati sa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛta iti ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:123: atrāpy anena jīvenātmanetīdam eva jñāyata iti pūrvam evoktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:124: ataḥ sarvasya cidacidvastuno brahmaśarīratvāt sarvaprakāraṃ sarvaśabdair brahmaivābhidhīyata iti tat tvam iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena jīvaśarīratayā jīvaprakāraṃ brahmaivābhihitam / (20)
GSP33ramvaspu:125: evam abhihite saty ayam artho jñāyate tvam iti yaḥ pūrvaṃ dehasyādhiṣṭhātṛtayā pratītaḥ sa paramātmaśarīratayā paramātmaprakārabhūtaḥ paramātmaparyantaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:126: atas tvam iti śabdas tvatprakāraviśiṣṭaṃ tvadantaryāmiṇam evācaṣṭa iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:127: anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇīti brahmātmakatayaiva jīvasya śarīriṇaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:128: svanāmabhāktvāt tat tvam iti sāmānādhikaraṇyapravṛttayor dvayor api padayor brahmaiva vācyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:129: tatra ca tatpadaṃ jagatkāraṇabhūtaṃ sakalakalyāṇaguṇagaṇākaraṃ nirvadyaṃ nirvikāram ācaṣṭe /
GSP33ramvaspu:130: tvam iti ca tad eva brahma jīvāntaryāmirūpeṇa saśarīraprakāraviśiṣṭam ācaṣṭe /
GSP33ramvaspu:131: tad evaṃ pravṛttinimittabhedenaikasmin brahmaṇy eva tat tvam iti dvayoḥ padayor vṛttir uktā /
GSP33ramvaspu:132: brahmaṇo niravadyaṃ nirvikāraṃ sakalakalyāṇaguṇagaṇākaratvaṃ jagatkāraṇatvaṃ cābādhitam / (21)
GSP33ramvaspu:133: aśrutavedāntāḥ puruṣāḥ padārthāḥ sarve jīvātmanaś ca brahmātmakā iti na paśyati sarvaśabdānāṃ ca kevaleṣu tattatpadārtheṣu vācyaikadeśeṣu vācyaparyavasānaṃ manyante /
GSP33ramvaspu:134: idānīṃ vedāntavākyaśravaṇena brahmakāryatayā tadantaryāmitayā ca sarvasya brahmātmakatvaṃ sarvaśabdānāṃ tattatprakārasaṃsthitabrahmavācitvaṃ ca jānanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:135: nanv evaṃ gavādiśabdānāṃ tattatpadārthavācitayā vyutpattir bādhitā syāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:136: naivaṃ sarve śabdā acijjīvaviśiṣṭasya paramātmano vācakā ity uktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:138: tatra laukikāḥ puruṣāḥ śabdaṃ vyāharantaḥ śabdavācye pradhānāṃśasya paramātmanaḥ pratyakṣādyaparicchedyatvād vācyaikadeśabhūte vācyasamāptiṃ manyante /
GSP33ramvaspu:140: evam eva vaidikāḥ sarve śabdāḥ paramātmaparyantān svārthān bodhayanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:141: vaidikā eva sarve śabdā vedādav uddhṛtyoddhṛtya pareṇaiva brahmaṇā sarvapadārthān pūrvavat sṛṣṭvā teṣu paramātmaparyanteṣu pūrvavan nāmatayā prayuktāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:143: sarveṣāṃ tu nāmāni karmāṇi ca pṛthak pṛthak /
GSP33ramvaspu:149: iti / śrutiś ca sūryācandramasau dhātā yathāpūrvam akalpayad iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:150: sūryādīn pūrvavat parikalpya nāmāni ca pūrvavac cakāra ityarthaḥ / (22)
GSP33ramvaspu:153: sarvasya brahmakāryatvapratipādanena tadātmakatayaiva satyatvaṃ nānyatheti tat satyam ityuktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:154: yathā dṛṣṭānte sarvasya mṛdvikārasya mṛdātmanaiva satyatvam / (23)
GSP33ramvaspu:155: śodhakavākyāny api niravadyaṃ sarvakalyāṇaguṇākaraṃ paraṃ brahma bodhayanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:157: nanu ca jñānamātraṃ brahmeti pratipādite nirviśeṣajñānamātraṃ brahmeti niścīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:159: svarūpanirūpaṇadharmaśabdā hi dharmamukhena svarūpam api pratipādayanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:161: tad āha sūtrakāraḥ tadguṇasāratvāt tadvyapadeśaḥ prājñavat /
GSP33ramvaspu:162: yāvad ātmabhāvitatvāc ca na doṣa iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:163: jñānena dharmeṇa svarūpam api nirūpitaṃ na jñānamātraṃ brahmeti /
GSP33ramvaspu:164: katham idam avagamyata iti ced yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavid ityādijñātṛtvaśruteḥ parāsya śaktir vividhaiva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñānabalakriyā ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:165: vijñātāram are kena vijānīyād ityādiśrutiśatasamadhigatam idam /
GSP33ramvaspu:167: ataḥ satyajñānādipadāni svārthabhūtajñānādiviśiṣṭam eva brahma pratipādayanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:168: tat tvam iti dvayor api padayoḥ svārthaprahāṇena nirviśeṣavastusvarūpopasthāpanaparatve mukhyārthaparityāgaś ca / (25)
GSP33ramvaspu:171: yathā so 'yam ity atra sa iti śabdena deśāntarakālāntarasaṃbandhī puruṣaḥ pratīyata ayam iti ca saṃnihitadeśavartamānakālasaṃbandhī,
GSP33ramvaspu:173: tatraikasya yugapadviruddhadeśakālasaṃbandhitayā pratītir na ghaṭata iti dvayor padayoḥ svarūpamātropasthāpanaparatvaṃ svarūpasya cāikyaṃ pratipadyata iti cen naitad evam /
GSP33ramvaspu:174: so 'yaṃ devadatta ity atrāpi lakṣaṇāgandho na vidyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:180: lakṣaṇāyām api na dvayor api padayor lakṣaṇāsamāśrayaṇam /
GSP33ramvaspu:184: evam atrāpi jagatkāraṇabūtasyaiva parasya brahmaṇo jīvāntaryāmitayā jīvātmatvam aviruddham iti pratipāditam /
GSP33ramvaspu:185: yathā bhūtayor eva hi dvayor aikyaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyena pratīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:186: tatparityāgena svarūpamātrāikyaṃ na sāmānādhikaraṇyārthaḥ bhinnapravṛttinimittānāṃ śabdānām ekasminn arthe vṛttiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti hi tadvidaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:189: upakrame hi tad aikṣata bahu syām ityādinā satyasaṃkalpatvaṃ jagadekakāraṇatvam apy uktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:191: api cārthabhedatatsaṃsargaviśeṣabodhanakṛtapadavākyasya svarūpatālabdhapramāṇabhāvasya śabdasya nirviśeṣavastubodhanāsāmarthān na nirviśeṣavastuni śabdaḥ pramāṇam /
GSP33ramvaspu:192: nirviśeṣa ityādiśabdās tu kenacid viśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭatayāvagatasya vastuno vastvantaragataviśeṣaniṣedhaparatayā bodhakāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:195: atha syāt nāsmābhir nirviśeṣe svayaṃprakāśe vastuni śabdaḥ pramāṇam ity ucyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:197: sarvaiḥ śabdais taduparāgaviśeṣā jñātṛtvādayaḥ sarve nirasyante /
GSP33ramvaspu:198: sarveṣu viśeṣeṣu nivṛtteṣu vastumātram anavacchinnaṃ svayaṃprakāśaṃ svata evāvatiṣṭhata iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:200: kena śabdena tadvastu nirdiśya tadgataviśeṣā nirasyante /
GSP33ramvaspu:204: jñā avabodhana iti sakarmakaḥ sakartṛkaḥ kriyāviśeṣaḥ kriyāntaravyāvartakasvabhāvaviśeṣaś ca prakṛtyāvagamyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:206: svataḥsiddhāv apy etatsvabhāvaviśeṣavirahe siddhir eva na syāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:208: brahmasvarūpaṃ kṛtsnaṃ sarvadā svayam eva prakāśate cen na tasminn anyadharmādhyāsaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:211: tataś ca śāstrīyanivartakajñānasya brahmaṇi tirohitāṃśo viṣayaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:212: anyathā tasya nivartakatvaṃ ca na syāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:214: ekaś ced viśeṣo jñānamātre vastuni śabdenābhidhīyate sa ca brahmaviśeṣaṇaṃ bhavatīti sarvaśrutipratipāditasarvaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭaṃ brahma bhavati
GSP33ramvaspu:215: ataḥ prāmāṇikānāṃ na kenāpi pramāṇena nirviśeṣavastusiddhiḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:218: vastusaṃsthānaviśeṣarūpatvād gotvāder nirvikalpatadaśāyām api sasaṃsthānam eva vastv ittham iti pratīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:220: saṃsthānarūpaprakārākhyasya padārthasyānekavastuniṣṭhatayānekavastuviśeṣaṇatvaṃ dvitīyādipratyayāvagamyam iti dvitīyādipratyayāḥ savikalpakā ity ucyante /
GSP33ramvaspu:221: ata evaikasya padārthasya bhinnābhinnatvarūpeṇa dvyātmakatvaṃ viruddhaṃ pratyuktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:223: prakāratvād eva pṛthaksiddhyanarhatvaṃ pṛthaganupalambhaś ceti na dvyātmakatvasiddhiḥ / (31)
GSP33ramvaspu:224: api ca nirviśeṣavastvādinā svayaṃprakāśe vastuni taduparāgaviśeṣāḥ sarvaiḥ śabdair nirasyanta iti vadatā ke te śabdā niṣedhakā iti vaktavyam
GSP33ramvaspu:225: vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttikety eva satyam iti vikāranāmadheyayor vācārambhaṇamātratvāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:226: yat tatra kāraṇatayopalakṣyate vastumātraṃ tad eva satyam anyad asatyam itīyaṃ śrutir vadatīti cen naitad upapadyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:227: ekasmin vijñāte sarvaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavatīti pratijñāte 'nyajñānenānyajñānāsaṃbhavaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:228: manvānasyaikam eva vastu vikārādyavasthāviśeṣeṇa pāramārthikenaiva nāmarūpam avasthitaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:229: cet tatraikasmin vijñāte tasmād vilakṣaṇasaṃsthānāntaram api tad eveti tatra dṛṣṭānto 'yaṃ nidarśitaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:230: nātra kasyacid viśeṣasya niṣedhakaḥ ko 'pi śabdo dṛśyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:231: vācārambhaṇam iti vācā vyavahāreṇārabhyata ity ārambhaṇam /
GSP33ramvaspu:233: ghaṭaśarāvādirūpeṇāvasthitāyās tasyā eva mṛttikāyā anyāni nāmadheyāni vyavahārāś cānyaddaśāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:234: tathāpi sarvatra mṛttikādravyam ekam eva nānāsaṃsthānanānānāmadheyābhyāṃ nānāvyavahāreṇa cārabhyata ityetad eva satyam ity anenānyajñānenānyajñānasaṃbhavo nidarśitaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:235: nātra kiṃcid vastu niṣidhyata iti pūrvam evāyam arthaḥ prapañcitaḥ / (32)
GSP33ramvaspu:236: api ca yenāśrutaṃ śrutam ityādinā brahmavyatiriktasya sarvasya mithyātvaṃ pratijñātaṃ ced yathā somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍenetyādidṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyavikalaḥ syāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:237: rajjusarpādivan mṛttikāvikārasya ghaṭaśarāvāder asatyatvaṃ śvetaketoḥ śuśrūṣoḥ pramāṇāntareṇa yuktyā cāsiddham ity etad api siṣādhayiṣitam iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:239: sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ekam evādvitīyam evādvitīyam ity atra sad evaikam evety
GSP33ramvaspu:240: avadhāraṇadvayenādvitīyam ity anena ca sanmātrātirekisajātīyavijātīyāḥ sarve viśeṣā
GSP33ramvaspu:241: niṣiddhā iti pratīyata iti cenn etad evam /
GSP33ramvaspu:243: vastvaikyena jñātatāṃ dṛṣṭāntena darśayitvā śvetaketor aprajñātaṃ sarvasya brahmakāraṇatvaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:244: ca vaktuṃ sad eva somyedam ity ārabdham /
GSP33ramvaspu:247: idaṃśabdavācyasya prapañcasya sadāpattirūpāṃ kriyāṃ sadravyatāṃ ca vadati /
GSP33ramvaspu:249: etasmin pratipādite 'sya jagataḥ sadupādānatā pratipāditā bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:251: asya sarvajñasya brahmaṇaḥ sarvaśaktiyogo na viruddha ity advitīyapadam adhiṣṭhātrantaraṃ nivārayati /
GSP33ramvaspu:253: kāścana śrutayaḥ prathamam upādānakāraṇatvaṃ pratipādya nimittakāraṇam api tad eveti pratipādayanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:255: anyāś ca śrutayo brahmaṇo nimittakāraṇatvam anujñāyāsyaivopādānatādi katham iti paricodya,
GSP33ramvaspu:256: sarvaśaktiyuktatvād upādānakāraṇaṃ taditarāśeṣopakaraṇaṃ ca brahmaiveti pariharanti
GSP33ramvaspu:257: kiṃsvid vanaṃ ka u sa vṛkṣa āsīd yato dyāvāpṛthivī niṣṭakṣurmaṇīṣiṇo manasā pṛcchated
GSP33ramvaspu:259: brahma vanaṃ brahma sa vṛkṣa āsīd yato dyāvāpṛthivī niṣṭatakṣur manīṣiṇo manasā vibravīmi vaḥ brahmādhyatiṣṭhad bhuvanāni /
GSP33ramvaspu:260: dhārayann iti sāmānyato dṛṣṭena virodham āśaṅkya brahmaṇaḥ sarvavilakṣaṇatvena parihāra uktaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:261: ataḥ sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ity atrāpy agra ityādyanekaviśeṣā brahmaṇo pratipāditāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:267: nimittopādānayor bhedanirasanena tasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ sarvaśaktiyogaś cety aprajñātaḥ sahasraśo viśeṣā eva pratipāditāḥ / (34)
GSP33ramvaspu:268: yato vāstavakāryakāraṇabhāvādivijñāne pravṛttam ata evāsad evedam agra āsīd ityārabhyāsatkāryavādaniṣedhaś ca kriyate kutas tu khalu somyaivaṃ syād iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:270: tad evopapādayati katham asataḥ saj jāyeteti /
GSP33ramvaspu:275: ekam eva kāraṇabhūtaṃ dravyam avasthāntarayogena kāryam ity ucyata ity ekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratipipādayiṣitam /
GSP33ramvaspu:277: tathā hi nimittasamavāyyasamavāyiprabhṛtiḥ kāraṇair avayavyākhyaṃ kāryaṃ dravyāntaram
GSP33ramvaspu:278: evotpadyata iti kāraṇabhūtād vastunaḥ kāryasya vastvantaratvān na tajjñānenāsya jñātatā
GSP33ramvaspu:280: katham avayavi dravyāntaraṃ nirasyata iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:282: upapādakatvād dravyāntarādarśanāc ceti kāraṇam evāvasthāntarāpannaṃ kāryam ity ucyata ity uktam / (36)
GSP33ramvaspu:284: tathā hy ekaṃ cidrūpaṃ satyam evāvidyāc chāditaṃ jagadrūpeṇa vivartata ity avidyāśrayatvāya mūlakāraṇaṃ satyam ity abhyupagantavyam ity asatkāryavādanirāsaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:286: ekavijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñādṛṣṭāntamukhena satkāryavādasyaiva prasaktatvād ity uktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:288: yasya hi cetanagatadoṣaḥ pāramārthiko doṣāśrayatvaṃ ca pāramārthikaṃ tasya pāramārthikadoṣeṇa yuktasyāpāramārthikagandharvanagarādidarśanam
GSP33ramvaspu:289: yasya tu doṣaś cāpāramārthiko doṣāśrayatvaṃ cāpāramārthikaṃ tasyāpāramārthikenāpy āśrayeṇa tad upapannam iti bhavatpakṣe na niradhiṣṭhānabhramāsaṃbhavaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:290: śodhakeṣv api satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahma,
GSP33ramvaspu:291: ānando brahmetyādiṣu vākyeṣu sāmānyādhikaraṇyavyutpattisiddhānekaguṇaviśiṣṭaikārthāvabodhanam aviruddham iti sarvaguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ brahmābhidhīyata iti pūrvam evoktam / (38)
GSP33ramvaspu:292: athāta ādeśo neti netīti bahudhā niṣedho dṛṣyata iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:294: dve vāva brahmaṇo rūpe mūrtaṃ caivāmūrtaṃ ceti mūrtāmūrtātmakaḥ prapañcaḥ sarvo 'pi niṣidhyata iti cen naivam /
GSP33ramvaspu:295: brahmaṇo rūpatayāprajñātaṃ sarvaṃ rūpatayopadiśya punar tad eva niṣeddhum ayuktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:296: prakṣālanād dhi paṅkasya dūrād asparśanaṃ varam iti nyāyāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:298: sūtrakāraḥ svayam eva vadati prakṛtaitāvattvaṃ hi pratiṣedhati tato bravīti ca bhūya iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:299: uttaratra atha nāmadheyaṃ saty asya satyaṃ prāṇā vai satyaṃ teṣām eṣa satyam iti satyādiguṇagaṇasya pratipāditatvāt pūrvaprakṛtaitāvanmātraṃ na bhavati brahmeti,
GSP33ramvaspu:301: neha nānāsti kiṃcanetyādinā nānātvapratiṣedha eva dṛṣyata iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:302: atrāpy uttaratra sarvasya vaśī sarvasyeśana iti satyasaṅkalpatvasarveśvaratvapratipādanāc
GSP33ramvaspu:303: cetanavastuśarīra īśvara iti sarvaprakārasaṃsthitaḥ sa eka eveti tatpratyanīkābrahmātmakanānātvaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:305: sarvāsv evaṃprakārāsu śrutiṣv iyam eva sthitir iti na kvacid api brahmaṇaḥ saviśeṣatvaniṣedhakavācī ko 'pi śabdo dṛśyate / (40)
GSP33ramvaspu:306: api ca nirviśeṣajñānamātraṃ brahma tac cāchādikāvidyātirohitasvarūpaṃ svagatanānātvaṃ paśyatīty ayam artho na ghaṭate /
GSP33ramvaspu:308: svarūpātirekiprakāśadharmānabhyupagamena prakāśasyaiva svarūpatvāt svarūpanāśa eva syāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:309: prakāśaparyāyaṃ jñānaṃ nityaṃ sa ca prakāśo 'vidyātirohita iti bāliśabhāṣitam idam /
GSP33ramvaspu:310: avidyayā prakāśatirohita iti prakāśotpattipratibandho vidyamānasya vināśo vā /
GSP33ramvaspu:313: satyām apy avidyāyāṃ brahmaṇi na kiṃcit tirohitam iti nānātvaṃ paśyatīti bhavatām ayaṃ vyavahāraḥ satsv anirvacanīya eva / (41)
GSP33ramvaspu:316: tasya ca devādisvarūpātmābhimāne svarūpaprakāśatirodhānam avaśyam āśrayaṇīyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:319: kiṃ cāsmākam ekasminn evātmani bhavadudīritaṃ durghaṭatvam bhavatām ātmānantyābhyupagamāt sarveṣv ayaṃ doṣaḥ pariharaṇīyaḥ / (42)
GSP33ramvaspu:325: vedaṃ cābhyupagacchatām asmākaṃ kiṃ na setsyati /
GSP33ramvaspu:327: yo mām ajam anādiṃ ca vetti lokamaheśvaram /
GSP33ramvaspu:328: dvāv imau puraṣau loke kṣaraś cākṣara eva ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:330: uttamaḥ puruṣas tv anyaḥ paramātmety udāhṛtaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:332: kālaṃ ca pacate tatra na kālas tatra vai prabhūḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:333: ete vai nirayās tāta sthānasya paramātmanaḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:335: krīḍā harer idaṃ sarvaṃ kṣaram ity avadhāryatām //
GSP33ramvaspu:336: kṛṣṇa eva hi lokānām utpattir api cāpyayaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:337: kṛṣṇasya hi kṛte bhūtam idaṃ viśvaṃ carācaram //
GSP33ramvaspu:338: iti / kṛṣṇasya hi kṛta iti kṛṣṇasya śeṣabhūtaṃ sarvam ityarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:344: evam eṣa mahāśabdo maitreya bhagavān iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:347: śabdo 'yaṃ nopacāreṇa tv anyatra hy upacārataḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:350: kalāmuhūrtādimayaś ca kālo na yadvibhūteḥ pariṇāmahetuḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:356: iti / āpastambenāpi pūḥ prāṇinaḥ sarva eva guhāśayasyeti /
GSP33ramvaspu:357: sarve prāṇino guhāśayas paramātmanaḥ pūḥ puraṃ śarīram ityarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:362: evam abhyupagacchatām asmākam ātmadharmabhūtasya caitanyasya svābhāvikasyāpi karmaṇā pāramārthikaṃ saṃkocaṃ vikāsaṃ ca bruvatāṃ sarvam idaṃ parihṛtam /
GSP33ramvaspu:363: bhavas tu prakāśa eva svarūpam iti prakāśo na dharmabhūtas tasya saṃkocavikāsau vā nābyupagamyete /
GSP33ramvaspu:365: avidyā cet tirodhānaṃ tirodhānabhūtatayāvidyayā svarūpabhūtaprakāśanāśa iti pūrvam evoktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:366: asmākaṃ tv avidyārūpeṇa karmaṇā svarūpanityadharmabhūtaprakāśaḥ saṃkucitaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:369: yathā kṣetraśaktiḥ sā veṣṭitā nṛpa sarvagā /
GSP33ramvaspu:373: iti / kṣetrajñānāṃ svadharmabhūtasya jñānasya karmasaṃjñāvidyayā saṃkocaṃ vikāsaṃ ca darśayati / (44)
GSP33ramvaspu:374: api cācchādikāvidyā śrutibhiś cāikyopadeśabalāc ca brahmasvarūpatirodhānaheyadoṣarūpāśrīyate tasyāś ca mithyārūpatvena prapañcavatsvadarśanamūladoṣāpekṣatvāt
GSP33ramvaspu:375: na sā mithyā darśanamūladoṣaḥ syād iti brahmaiva mithyādarśanamūlaṃ syāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:376: tasyāś cānāditve 'pi mithyārūpatvād eva brahmadṛśyatvenaivānāditvāt taddarśanamūlaparamārthadoṣānabhyupagamāc ca brahmaiva taddarśanamūlaṃ syāt
GSP33ramvaspu:378: ata evedam api nirastam ekam eva śarīraṃ jīvavat,
GSP33ramvaspu:380: tatra svapne draṣṭuḥ śarīram ekam eva jīvavat /
GSP33ramvaspu:382: anenaikenaiva parikalpitatvāj jīvā mithyābhūtā iti brahmaṇā svasvarūpavyatiriktasya
GSP33ramvaspu:383: jīvabhāvasya sarvaśarīrāṇāṃ ca kalpitatvād ekasminn api śarīre śarīravaj jīvabhāvasya
GSP33ramvaspu:385: tatra jīvabhāvaś ca mithyārūpa ity ekasya śarīrasya tatra jīvabhāvasya ca na kaścid viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:386: asmākaṃ tu svapne draṣṭuḥ svaśarīrasya tasminn ātmasadbhāvasya ca prabodhavelāyām
GSP33ramvaspu:387: abādhitatvān anyeṣāṃ śarīrāṇāṃ tadgatajīvānāṃ ca bādhitatvāt te sarve mithyābhūtāḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:388: svaśarīram ekaṃ tasmiñ jīvabhāvaś ca paramārtha iti viśeṣaḥ / (46)
GSP33ramvaspu:389: api ca kena vā vidyānivṛttiḥ sā kīdṛśīti vivecanīyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:391: anirvacanīyapratyanīkaṃ nirvacanīyaṃ tac ca sad vāsad vā dvirūpaṃ vā koṭyantaraṃ na vidyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:392: brahmavyatirekeṇaitadabhyupagame punar avidyā na nivṛttā syāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:393: brahmaiva cen nivṛttis tatprāg apy aviśiṣṭam iti vedāntajñānāt pūrvam eva nivṛttiḥ syāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:394: aikyajñānaṃ nivartakaṃ tadabhāvāt saṃsāra iti bhavaddarśanaṃ vihanyate / (47)
GSP33ramvaspu:395: kiñ ca nivartakajñānasyāpy avidyārūparvāt tannivartanaṃ keneti vaktavyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:396: nivartakajñānaṃ svetarasamastabhedaṃ nivartya kṣaṇikatvād eva svayam eva vinaśyati dāvānalaviṣanāśanaviṣāntaravad iti cen na /
GSP33ramvaspu:397: nivartakajñānasya brahmavyatiriktatvena tatsvarūpatadutpattivināśānāṃ mithyārūpatvāt tadvināśarūpā vidyā tiṣṭhaty eveti tadvināśadarśanasya nivartakaṃ vaktacyam eva /
GSP33ramvaspu:403: brahmaṇo nivartakajñānaṃ prati jñātṛtvaṃ kiṃ svarūpam utādhyastam /
GSP33ramvaspu:404: adhyastaṃ ced ayam adhyāsas tanmūlavidyāntaraṃ ca nivartakajñānaviṣayatayā tiṣṭhaty eva /
GSP33ramvaspu:406: sarvasya hi jñānasya trirūpakatvavirahe jñānatvam eva hīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:408: jñānasya trirūpatvavirahe bhavatāṃ svarūpabhūtajñānavan nivartakajñānam apy anivartakaṃ syāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:409: brahmasvarūpasyaiva jñātṛtvābhyupagame 'smadīya eva pakṣaḥ parigṛhītaḥ syāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:410: nivartakajñānasvarūpajñātṛtvaṃ ca svanivartyāntargatam iti vacanaṃ bhūtalavyatiriktaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:411: kṛtsnaṃ chinnaṃ devadattenety asyām eva chedanakriyāyām asyāś chedanakriyāyāś chettṛtvasya
GSP33ramvaspu:413: api ca nikhilabhedanivartakam idam aikyajñānaṃ kena jātam iti vimarśanīyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:415: tasyā brahmavyatiriktāyā avidyāparikalpitatvāt prapañcabādhakajñānasyotpādakatvaṃ na saṃbhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:416: tathā hi duṣṭakāraṇajātam api rajjusarpajñānaṃ na duṣṭakāraṇajanyena rajjur iyaṃ na sarpa iti jñānena bādhyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:417: rajjusarpajñānabhaye vartamāne kenacidbhrāntena puruṣeṇa rajjur iyaṃ na sarpa ityukte
GSP33ramvaspu:418: 'py ayaṃ bhrānta iti jñāte sati tadvacanaṃ rajjusarpajñānasya bādhakaṃ na bhavati
GSP33ramvaspu:420: prayojakajñānavataḥ śravaṇavelāyām eva hi brahmavyatiriktatvena śruter api bhrāntimūlatvaṃ jñātam iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:421: nivartakajñānasya jñātus tatsāmagrībhūtaśāstrasya ca brahmavyatiriktatayā yadi bādhyatvam ucyate hanta tarhi prapañcanivṛtter mithyātvam āpatatīti prapañcasya satyatā syāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:423: kiñca tat tvam asy ādivākyaṃ na prapañcasya bādhakam /
GSP33ramvaspu:425: nanu ca svapne kasmiṃścid bhaye vartamāne svapnadaśāyām evāyaṃ svapna iti jñāte sati pūrvabhayanivṛttir dṛṣṭā /
GSP33ramvaspu:428: svapnavelāyām eva so 'pi svapna iti jñāte sati punarbhayānivṛttir eva dṛṣṭeti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ / (51)
GSP33ramvaspu:429: śravaṇavelāyām eva so'pi svapna iti jñātam evetyuktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:430: yad api cedam uktaṃ bhrāntiparikalpitatvena mithyārūpam api śāstram advitīyaṃ brahmeti bodhayati tasya sato brahmaṇo viṣayasya paścāt tanabādhādarśanād brahma susthitam eveti /
GSP33ramvaspu:432: śūnyam eva tat tvam iti vākyena tasyāpi bādhitatvāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:434: sad advitīyaṃ brahmeti vākyam api bhrāntimūlam iti tvayaivoktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:436: sarvaśūnyavādino brahmavyatiriktavastumithyātvavādinaś ca svapakṣasādhanapramāṇapāramārthyānabyupagamenābhiyuktair vādānadhikāra eva pratipāditaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:438: api ca pratyakṣadṛṣṭasya prapañcasya mithyātvaṃ kena pramāṇena sādhyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:439: pratyakṣasya doṣamūlatvenānyathāsiddhisaṃbhavān nirdoṣaṃ śāstram ananyathāsiddhaṃ pratyakṣasya bādhakam iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:440: kena doṣeṇa jātaṃ pratyakṣam anantabhedaviṣayam iti vaktavyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:442: hanta tarhy anenaiva doṣeṇa jātaṃ śāstram apīty ekadoṣamūlatvāc chāstrapratyakṣayor na bādhyabādhakabhāvasiddhiḥ / (53)
GSP33ramvaspu:447: vadatā pratyakṣapāramārthyam avaśyam abhyupagantavyam ity alam anena śrutiśatavitativātavegaparāhatakudṛṣṭiduṣṭayuktijālatūlanirasanenety uparamyate
GSP33ramvaspu:448: dvitīye tu pakṣa upādhibrahmavyatiriktavastvantarānabhyupagamād brahmaṇy evopādhisaṃsargād aupādhikāḥ sarve doṣā brahmaṇy eva bhaveyuḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:450: yathā ghaṭākāśādeḥ paricchinnatayā mahākāśād vailakṣaṇyaṃ parasparabhedaś ca dṛśyate
GSP33ramvaspu:451: tatrasthā guṇā vā doṣā vānavacchinne mahākāśe na saṃbadhyante evam upādhikṛtabhedavyavasthitajīvagatā
GSP33ramvaspu:452: doṣā anupahite pare brahmaṇi na saṃbadhyanta iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:454: niravayavasyākāśasyānavacchedyasya ghaṭādibhiś chedāsaṃbhavāt tenaivākāśena ghaṭādayaḥ saṃyuktā iti brahmaṇo 'py acchedyatvād brahmaivopādhisaṃyuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:456: ākāśasyaikasyaiva pradeśabhedena ghaṭādisaṃyogād ghaṭādau gacchati tasya ca pradeśabhedasyāniyama
GSP33ramvaspu:457: iti tadvad brahmaṇy eva pradeśabhedāniyamenopādhisaṃsargād upādhau gacchati saṃyuktaviyuktabrahmapradeśabhedāc
GSP33ramvaspu:458: ca brahmaṇy evopādhisaṃsargaḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe bandhamokṣau syātām iti santaḥ parihasanti / (56)
GSP33ramvaspu:459: niravayavasyaivākāśasya śrotrendriyatve 'pīndriyavyavasthāvad brahmaṇy api vyavasthopapadyata iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:461: ākāśasya tu sarveṣāṃ śarīreṣu gacchat svaniyamena sarvapradeśasaṃyoga iti brahmaṇy upādhisaṃyogapradeśāniyama eva / (57)
GSP33ramvaspu:464: vaikārikād ahaṃkārād ekādaśendriyāṇi jāyanta iti hi vaidikāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:467: ekādaśaṃ manaś cātra devā vaikārikāḥ smṛtāḥ // iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:470: sa ca kramāt sāttviko rājasas tāmasaś ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:471: tatra tāmasād bhūtāder ākāśādīni bhūtāni jāyanta iti sṛṣṭikramam uktvā taijasād rājasād
GSP33ramvaspu:472: ahaṃkārād ekadaśendriyāṇi jāyanta iti paramatam upanyasya sāttvikāhaṃkārād vaikārikānīndriyāṇi
GSP33ramvaspu:473: jāyanta iti svamatam ucyate devā vaikārikāḥ smṛtā iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:475: evam indriyāṇām āhaṃkārikāṇāṃ bhūtaiś cāpy āyanaṃ mahābhārata ucyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:477: eva śarīravat puruṣāṇām indriyāṇi bhavantīti brahmaṇy acchedye niravayave nirvikāre
GSP33ramvaspu:478: tv aniyamenānantaheyopādhisaṃsargadoṣo duṣparihara eveti śraddadhānānām evāyam pakṣa
GSP33ramvaspu:481: niravadyatā ca brahmaṇaḥ śaktipariṇāma iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:486: tṛtīye 'pi pakṣe jīvabrahmaṇor bhedavad abhedasya cābhyupagamāt tasya ca tadbhāvāt
GSP33ramvaspu:487: saubharibhedavac ca svāvatārabhedavac ca sarvasyeśvarabhedatāt sarve jīvagatā doṣās tasyaiva syuḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:489: īśvaraḥ svarūpeṇaiva suranaratiryaksthāvarādibhedenāvasthita iti hi tadātmakatvavarṇanaṃ kriyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:490: tathā saty ekamṛtpiṇḍārabdhaghaṭaśarāvādigatāny udakāharaṇādīni sarvakāryāṇi yathā tasyaiva bhavanti,
GSP33ramvaspu:491: evaṃ sarvajīvagatasukhaduḥkhādi sarvam īśvaragatam eva syāt / (59)
GSP33ramvaspu:492: ghaṭaśarāvādisaṃsthānānupayuktamṛddravyaṃ yathā kāryāntarānvitam evam eva surapaśumanujādijīvatvānupayukteśvaraḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:493: sarvajñaḥ satyasaṃkalpatvādikalyāṇaguṇākara iti cet satyaṃ sa eveśvara ekenāṃśena
GSP33ramvaspu:494: kalyāṇaguṇagaṇākaraḥ sa evānyenāṃśena heyaguṇākara ity uktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:498: ekasyaivānekāṃśena nityaduḥkhitvād aṃśāntareṇa sukhitvam api neśvaratvāya kalpate /
GSP33ramvaspu:500: haste mudgarābhighātaḥ kālānalajvālānupraveśaś ca tadvad eveśvarasya syād iti brahmājñānapakṣād
GSP33ramvaspu:502: aparimitaduḥkhasya pāramārthikatvāt saṃsāriṇām anantatvena dustaratvāc ca / (60)
GSP33ramvaspu:505: īśvarasya svarūpeṇa tādātmyavarṇane syād ayaṃ doṣaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:506: ātmaśarīrabhāvena tu tādātmyapratipādane na kaścid doṣaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:507: praty uta nikhilabhuvananiyamanādir mahān ayaṃ guṇagaṇaḥ pratipādito bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:509: api caikasya vastuno bhinnābhinnatvaṃ viruddhatvān na saṃbhavatītyuktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:510: ghaṭasya paṭād bhinnatve sati tasya tasminn abhāvaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:511: abhinnatve sati tasya ca bhāva iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:512: ekasmin kāle caikasmin deśe caikasya hi padārthasya yugapatsadbhāvo 'sadbhāvaś ca viruddhaḥ / (62)
GSP33ramvaspu:513: jātyātmanā bhāvo vyaktyātmanā cābhāva iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:514: jāter muṇḍena cābhāve sati khaṇḍe muṇḍasyāpi sadbhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:515: khaṇḍena ca jāter abhinnatve sadbhāvo bhinnatve cāsadbhāvaḥ aśve mahiśatvasyaiveti virodho duṣparihara eva /
GSP33ramvaspu:516: jātyāder vastusaṃsthānatayā vastunaḥ prakāratvāt prakāraprakāriṇoś ca padārthāntaratvaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:517: prakārasya pṛthaksiddhyanarhatvaṃ pṛthaganupalambhaś ca tasya ca saṃsthānasya cānekavastuṣu
GSP33ramvaspu:519: so 'yam iti buddhiḥ prakārāikyād ayam api daṇḍīti buddhimat /
GSP33ramvaspu:520: ayam ca jātyādiprakāro vastuno bheda ity ucyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:521: tadyoga eva vastuno bhinnam iti vyavahārahetur ityarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:522: sa ca vastuno bhedavyavahārahetuḥ svasya ca saṃvedanavat /
GSP33ramvaspu:523: yathā saṃvedanaṃ vastuno vyavahārahetuḥ svasya vyavahārahetuś ca bhavati / (64)
GSP33ramvaspu:524: ata eva sanmātragrāhi pratyakṣaṃ na bhedagrāhītyādivādā nirastāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:525: jātyādisaṃsthānasaṃsthitasyaiva vastunaḥ pratyakṣeṇa gṛhītatvāt tasyaiva saṃsthānarūpajātyādeḥ pratiyogyapekṣayā bhedavyavahārahetutvāc ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:527: yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan pṛthivyā antaro yaṃ pṛthivī na veda yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ yaḥ pṛthivīm antaro yamayati eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:528: ya ātmani tiṣṭhann ātmano 'ntaro ya ātmā na veda yasyātmā śarīraṃ ya ātmānam antaro yamayati eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:529: yaḥ pṛthivīm antare saṃcaran yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ yaṃ pṛthivī na vedetyādi yo 'kṣaram
GSP33ramvaspu:530: antare saṃcaran yasyākṣaraṃ śarīraṃ akṣaraṃ na veda yo mṛtyum antare saṃcaran yasya
GSP33ramvaspu:531: mṛtyuḥ śarīraṃ yaṃ mṛtyur na veda eṣa sarvabhūtāntarātmāpahatapāpmā divyo deva eko nārāyaṇaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:532: dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā samānaṃ vṛkṣaṃ pariṣasvajāte /
GSP33ramvaspu:533: tayor anyaḥ pippalaṃ svādv atty anaśnann anyo 'bhicākaśīti /
GSP33ramvaspu:536: tadanupraviśya sac ca tyac cānṛtaṃ ca satyam abhavat /
GSP33ramvaspu:538: pṛthagātmānaṃ preritāraṃ matvā jaṣṭas tatas tenāmṛtatvam eti /
GSP33ramvaspu:539: bhoktā bhogyaṃ preritāraṃ ca matvā sarvaṃ proktaṃ trividhaṃ brahma, etat /
GSP33ramvaspu:540: nityo nityānāṃ cetanaś cetanānām eko bahūnāṃ yo vidadhāti kāmān /
GSP33ramvaspu:542: jñājñau dvav ajav īśānīśav ityādiśrutiśatais tadupabṛṃhaṇaiḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:543: jagat sarvaṃ śarīraṃ te sthairyaṃ te vasudhātalam //
GSP33ramvaspu:544: yat kiṃcit sṛjyate yena sattvajātena vai dvija /
GSP33ramvaspu:545: tasya sṛjyasya saṃbhūtau tatsarvaṃ vai hares tanuḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:550: cidacidātmakasya vastunas taccharīratvāvagamāc ca śarīrasya śarīriṇaṃ prati prakāratayaiva
GSP33ramvaspu:551: padārthatvāc śarīraśarīriṇoś ca dharmabhede 'pi tayor asaṃkarāt sarvaśarīraṃ brahmeti
GSP33ramvaspu:552: brahmaṇo vaibhavaṃ pratipādayadbhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyādibhir mukhyavṛttaiḥ sarvacetanācetanaprakāraṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:556: tathā hi tat tvam iti sāmānādhikaraṇye tad ityanena jagatkāraṇaṃ sarvakalyāṇaguṇagaṇākaraṃ niravadyaṃ brahmocyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:557: tvam iti ca cetanasāmānādhikaraṇyavṛttena jīvāntaryānirūpi taccharīraṃ tadātmatayāvasthitaṃ tatprakāraṃ brahmocyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:558: itareṣu pakṣeṣu sāmānādhikaraṇyahānir brahmaṇaḥ sadeṣatā ca syāt / (66)
GSP33ramvaspu:560: brahmaivam avasthitam ity atraivaṃśabdārthabhūtaprakāratayaiva vicitracetanācetanātmakaprapañcasya sthūlasya sūkṣmasya ca sadbhāvaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:561: tathā ca bahu syāṃ prajāyeyety ayam arthaḥ saṃpanno bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:562: tasyaiveśvarasya kāryatayā kāraṇatayā ca nānāsaṃsthānasaṃsthitasya saṃsthānatayā cidacidvastujātam avasthitam iti / (67)
GSP33ramvaspu:563: nanu ca saṃsthānarūpeṇa prakāratayaivaṃśabdārthatvam jātiguṇayor eva dṛṣṭaṃ na dravyasya /
GSP33ramvaspu:565: ucyate dravyasyāpi daṇḍakuṇḍalāder dravyāntaraprakāratvaṃ dṛṣṭam eva /
GSP33ramvaspu:566: nanu ca daṇḍādeḥ svatantrasya dravyāntaraprakāratve matvarthīyapratyayo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:568: ato gotvāditulyatayā cetanācetanasya dravyabhūtasya vastuna īśvaraprakāratayā sāmānādhikaraṇyena pratipādanaṃ na yujyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:569: atrocyate gaur aśvo manuṣyo deva iti bhūtasaṃghātarūpāṇāṃ dravyāṇām eva devadatto manuṣyo jātaḥ puṇyaviśeṣeṇa yajñadatto gaurjātaḥ pāpena,
GSP33ramvaspu:570: anyaś cetanaḥ puṇyātirekeṇa devo jāta ityādidevādiśarīrāṇāṃ cetanaprakāratayā lokadevayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyena pratipādanaṃ dṛṣṭam / (68)
GSP33ramvaspu:571: ayam arthaḥ jātir vā guṇo vā dravyaṃ vā na tatrādaraḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:572: kaṃcana dravyaviśeṣaṃ prati viśeṣaṇatayaiva yasya sadbhāvas tasya tadapṛthaksiddhes tatprakāratayā tatsāmānādhikaraṇyena pratipādanaṃ yuktam
GSP33ramvaspu:573: yasya punar dravyasya pṛthaksiddhasyaiva kadācitkvaciddravyāntaraprakāratvam iṣyate tatra matvarthīyapratyaya iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:574: evam eva sthāvarajaṅgamātmakasya sarvasya vastuna īśvaraśarīratvena tatprakāratayaiva svarūpasadbhāva iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:575: tatprakārīśvara eva tattacchabdenābhidhīyata iti tatsāmānādhikaraṇyena pratipādanaṃ yuktaṃ /
GSP33ramvaspu:576: tad evaitat sarvaṃ pūrvam eva nāmarūpavyākaraṇaśrutivivaraṇe prapañcitam / (69)
GSP33ramvaspu:578: kāryam api sarvaṃ brahmaiveti kāraṇabhūtabrahmavijñānād eva sarvaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavatīty
GSP33ramvaspu:580: tad evaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvādimukhena kṛtsnasya cidacidvastunaḥ parabrahmaprakāratayā tadātmakatvam uktam / (70)
GSP33ramvaspu:581: nanu ca parasya brahmaṇaḥ svarūpeṇa pariṇāmāspadatvaṃ nirvikāratvaniravadyatvaśrutivyākopaprasañgena nivāritam /
GSP33ramvaspu:582: prakṛtiś ca pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparodhād ity ekavijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñānamṛttatkāryadṛṣṭāntābhyāṃ paramapuruṣasya jagadupādānakāraṇatvaṃ ca pratipāditam /
GSP33ramvaspu:586: tatreśvarasya jīvarūpapariṇāmābhyupagamena nātmā śruter nityatvāc ca tābhya iti virudhyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:587: vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyaparihāraś ca jīvanam anāditvābhyupagamena tatkarmanimittatayā pratipāditaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:588: vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvān na karmavibhāgād iti cen na anāditvād upapadyate
GSP33ramvaspu:590: tathā prakṛter apy anāditā śrutibhiḥ pratipaditā
GSP33ramvaspu:591: ajām ekāṃ lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāṃ bahnīṃ prajāṃ janayantīṃ sarūpām /
GSP33ramvaspu:592: ajo hy eko juṣamāṇo 'nuśete jahāty enāṃ bhuktabhogām ajo 'nyaḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:594: asmān māyī sṛjate viśvam etat tasmiṃś cānyo māyayā saṃniruddhaḥ māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyān māyinaṃ tu maheśvaram iti prakṛtir eva svarūpeṇa vikārāspadam iti ca darśayati /
GSP33ramvaspu:595: gaur anādyantavatī sā janitrī bhūtabhāvinīti ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:597: prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ caiva viddhy anādī ubhav api /
GSP33ramvaspu:598: vikārāṃś ca guṇāṃś caiva viddhi prakṛtisaṃbhavān //
GSP33ramvaspu:599: bhūmir āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ khaṃ mano buddhir eva ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:600: ahaṃkāra itīyaṃ me bhinnā prakṛtir aṣṭadhā //
GSP33ramvaspu:601: apareyam itas tv anyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parām /
GSP33ramvaspu:603: prakṛtiṃ svām avaṣṭabhya visṛjāmi punaḥ punaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:606: evaṃ ca prakṛter apīśvaraśarīratvāt prakṛtiśabdo 'pi tadātmabhūtasyeśvarasya tatprakārasaṃsthitasya vācakaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:608: atas tadvikārāṇām api tatheśvara evātmā / tad āha
GSP33ramvaspu:609: vyaktaṃ viṣṇus tathāvyaktaṃ puruṣaḥ kāla eva ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:610: sā eva kṣobhako brahman kṣobhyaś ca parameśvaraḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:611: iti / ataḥ prakṛtiprakārasaṃsthite paramātmani prakārabhūtaprakṛtyaṃse vikāraḥ prakāryaṃse cāvikāraḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:612: evam eva jīvaprakārasaṃsthite paramātmani ca prakārabhūtajīvāṃśe sarve cāpuruṣārthāḥ prakāryaṃśo niyantā niravadyaḥ sarvakalyāṇaguṇākaraḥ satyasaṃkalpa eva / (74)
GSP33ramvaspu:613: tathā ca sati kāraṇāvastha īśvara eveti tadupādānakajagatkāryāvastho 'pi sa eveti kāryakāraṇayor ananyatvaṃ sarvaśrutyavirodhaś ca bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:617: brahmaṇas tathāvidhasthūlabhāva eva jagataḥ sṛṣṭir ity ucyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:620: tasmād īśvaraprakārabhūtasarvāvasthaprakṛtipuruṣavācinaḥ śabdās tatprakāraviśiṣṭatayāvasthite paramātmani mukhyatayā vartante /
GSP33ramvaspu:622: yathā devamanuṣyādiśabdā devamanuṣyādiprakṛtipariṇāmaviśeṣāṇāṃ jīvātmaprakāratayaiva padārthatvāt prakāriṇi jīvātmani mukhyatayā vartante /
GSP33ramvaspu:623: tasmāt sarvasya cidacidvastunaḥ paramātmaśarīratayā tatprakāratvāt paramātmani mukhyatayā vartante sarve vācakāḥ śabdāḥ / (76)
GSP33ramvaspu:624: ayam eva cātmaśarīrabhāvaḥ pṛthaksiddhyanarhādhārādheyabhāvo niyantṛniyāmyabhāvaḥ śeṣaśeṣibhāvaś ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:625: sarvātmanādhāratayā niyantṛtayā śeṣitayā ca āpnotīty ātmā sarvātmanādheyatayā niyāmyatayā śeṣatayā ca apṛthaksiddhaṃ prakārabhūtam ity ākāraḥ śarīram iti cocyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:628: tad āha śrutigaṇaḥ sarve vedā yatpadam āmananti sarve vedā yatraikaṃ bhavantīti /
GSP33ramvaspu:631: sahaiva santaṃ na vijānanti devā ityādi /
GSP33ramvaspu:633: devamanuṣyādīnām antaryāmitayātmatvena niviśya sahaiva santaṃ teṣām indriyāṇi manaḥparyantāni na vijānantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:635: natāḥ sma sarvavacasāṃ pratiṣṭhā yatra śaśvatī /
GSP33ramvaspu:637: kāryāṇāṃ kāraṇāṃ pūrvaṃ vacasāṃ vācyam uttamam /
GSP33ramvaspu:638: vedaiś ca sarvair aham eva vedyaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:639: ityādīni sarvāṇi hi vacāṃsi saśarīrātmaviśiṣṭam antaryāmiṇam evācakṣate /
GSP33ramvaspu:640: hantāham imās tisro devatā anena jīvenātmānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇīti hi śrutiḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:643: rukmābhaṃ svapnadhīgamyaṃ vidyāt taṃ puruṣaṃ param //
GSP33ramvaspu:644: antaḥ praviśyāntaryāmitayā sarveṣāṃ praśāsitāraṃ niyantāram aṇīyāṃsa ātmānaḥ kṛtsnasyācetanasya
GSP33ramvaspu:645: vyāpakatayā sūkṣmabhūtās te teṣām api vyāpakatvāt tebhyo 'pi sūkṣmatara ityarthaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:648: enam eke vadanty agniṃ māruto 'nye prajāpatim /
GSP33ramvaspu:649: indram eke pare pramāṇam apare brahma śāśvatam //
GSP33ramvaspu:651: uktarītyā parasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ sarvasya praśāsitṛtvena sarvāntarātmatayā praviśyāvasthitatvād agnyādayaḥ śabdā api śāśvatabrahmaśabdavat tasyaiva vācakā bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:653: ye yajanti pitQn devān brāhmaṇān sahutāśanān /
GSP33ramvaspu:655: iti / pitṛdevabrāhmaṇahutāśanādiśabdās tanmukhena tadantarātmabhūtasya viṣṇor eva vācakā ityuktaṃ bhavati / (78)
GSP33ramvaspu:656: atredaṃ sarvaśāstrahṛdayam jīvātmānaḥ svayam asaṃkucitāparicchinnanirmalajñānasvarūpāḥ santaḥ karmarūpāvidyāveṣṭitās tattatkarmānurūpajñānasaṃkocam
GSP33ramvaspu:659: eteṣāṃ saṃsāramocanaṃ bhagavatprapattim antareṇa nopapadyata iti tadarthaḥ prathamam eṣāṃ devādibhedarahitajñānaikākāratayā sarveṣāṃ sāmyaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:660: tasyāpi svarūpasya bhagavaccheṣataikarasatayā bhagavadātmakatām api pratipādya,
GSP33ramvaspu:666: duḥkhājñānamalā dharmā prakṛtes te na cātmanaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:670: śuni caiva śvapāke ca pāṇḍitāḥ samadarśinaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:671: iti / devatiryaṅmanuṣyasthāvararūpaprakṛtisaṃsṛṣṭasyātmanaḥ svarūpavivecanī buddhir eṣāṃ te paṇḍitāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:672: tattat prakṛtiviśeṣaviyuktātmayāthātmyajñānavantas tatra tatrātyantaviṣamākāre vartamānam ātmānaṃ samānākāraṃ paśyantīti samadarśina ity uktam
GSP33ramvaspu:674: ihaiva tair jitaḥ sargo yeṣāṃ sāmye sthitaṃ manaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:675: nirdoṣaṃ hi samaṃ brahma tasmād brahmaṇi te sthitāḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:676: iti / nirdoṣaṃ devādiprakṛtiviśeṣasaṃsargarūpadoṣarahitaṃ svarūpeṇāvasthitaṃ sarvam ātmavastu nirvāṇarūpajñānaikākāratayā samam ityarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:677: tasyaivaṃbhūtasyātmano bhagavaccheṣataikarasatā tanniyāmyatā tadekādhāratā ca taccharīratattanuprabhṛtibhiḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:678: śabdais tatsamānādhikaraṇyena ca śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇeṣu pratipādyata iti pūrvam evoktam / (81)
GSP33ramvaspu:679: daivī hy eṣā guṇamayī mama māyā duratyayā /
GSP33ramvaspu:680: mām eva ye prapadyante māyām etāṃ taranti te //
GSP33ramvaspu:681: iti tasyātmanaḥ karmakṛtavicitraguṇamayaprakṛtisaṃsargarūpāt saṃsārān mokṣo bhagavatprapattim antareṇa nopapadayata ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:682: nānyaḥ panthā ayanāya vidyata ityādiśrutibhiś ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:683: mayā tatam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagad avyaktamūrtinā /
GSP33ramvaspu:684: matsthāni sarvabhūtāni na cāhaṃ teṣu avasthitaḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:685: na ca matsthāni bhūtāni paśya me yogam aiśvaram //
GSP33ramvaspu:686: iti sarvaśaktiyogāt svāiśvaryavaicitryam uktam / tad āha
GSP33ramvaspu:687: viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat /
GSP33ramvaspu:688: iti anantavicitramahāścaryarūpaṃ jagan mamāyutāṃśenātmatayā praviśya sarvaṃ matsaṃkalpena
GSP33ramvaspu:692: ekatve sati nānātvaṃ nānātve sati caikatā /
GSP33ramvaspu:693: acintyaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ kutas tadveditum arhati //
GSP33ramvaspu:694: iti / praśāsitṛtvenaika eva sanvicitracidacidvastuṣv antarātmatayā praviśya tattadrūpeṇa vicitraprakāro vicitrakarma kārayan nānārūpāṃ bhajate
GSP33ramvaspu:695: evaṃ svalpāṃśena tu sarvāścaryaṃ nānārūpaṃ jagattadantarātmatayā praviśya viṣṭabhya
GSP33ramvaspu:697: parabrahmabhūtaḥ puruṣottamo nārāyaṇo niratiśayāścaryabhūto nīlatoyadasaṃkāśaḥ puṇḍarīkadalāmalāyatekṣaṇaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:698: sahasrāṃśusahasrakiraṇaḥ parame vyomni yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ parame vyomaṃs tadakṣare
GSP33ramvaspu:700: brahmavyatiriktasya kasyacid api vastuna ekasvabhāvasyaikakāryaśaktiyuktasyaikarūpasya rūpāntarayogaḥ svabhāvāntarayogaḥ śaktyantarayogaś ca na ghaṭate /
GSP33ramvaspu:702: cety ekasyaiva vicitrānantarūpatā ca punar apy anantāparimitāścaryayogenaikarūpatā
GSP33ramvaspu:703: ca na viruddheti vastumātrasāmyād virodhacintā na yuktetyarthaḥ / yathoktaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:705: yato 'to brahmaṇas tās tu sargādyā bhāvaśaktayaḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:707: etad uktaṃ bhavati sarveṣām agnijalādīnāṃ bhāvānām ekasminn api bhāve dṛṣṭaiva śaktis
GSP33ramvaspu:708: tadvijātīyabhāvāntare 'pīti na cintayituṃ yuktā jalādāv adṛṣṭāpi tadvijātīyapāvake
GSP33ramvaspu:710: evam eva sarvavastuvisajātīye brahmaṇi sarvasāmyaṃ nānumātuṃ yuktam iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:712: jagad etan mahāścaryaṃ rūpaṃ yasya mahātmanaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:717: brahmaṇo 'nekavidhāḥ śrutayo vadanti niravadyaṃ nirañjanaṃ vijñānam ānandaṃ nirvikāraṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:718: niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śāntaṃ nirguṇam ity ādikāḥ nirguṇaṃ jñānasvarūpaṃ brahmeti kāścana
GSP33ramvaspu:720: neha nānāsti kiṃcana mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyum āpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati yatra tv asya
GSP33ramvaspu:721: sarvam ātmaivābhūt tat kena kaṃ paśyet tat kena kaṃ vijātīyād ityādikā nānātvaniṣedhavādinyaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:723: yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavit yasya jñānamayaṃ tapaḥ sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya dhīro nāmāni
GSP33ramvaspu:724: kṛtvābhivadan yad āste sarve nimeṣā jajñire vidyutaḥ puruṣādadhi apahatapāpmā vijaro
GSP33ramvaspu:725: vimṛtyur viśoko vijaghatso 'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpa iti sarvasmiñ jagati
GSP33ramvaspu:726: heyatayāvagataṃ sarvaguṇaṃ pratiṣidhya niratiśayakalyāṇaguṇānantyaṃ sarvajñatā sarvaśaktiyogaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:727: sarvanāmarūpavyākaraṇaṃ sarvasyāvadhāratāṃ ca kāścana śrutayo bruvate /
GSP33ramvaspu:728: sarvaṃ khalv idaṃ brahma tajjalān iti aitadātmyam idaṃ sarvaṃ ekaḥ san bahudhā vicāra ityādikā brahmasṛṣṭaṃ jagan nānākāraṃ pratipādya tadaikyaṃ ca pratipādayanti kāścana /
GSP33ramvaspu:729: pṛthagātmānaṃ preritāraṃ ca matvā bhoktā bhogyaṃ preritāraṃ ca matvā prajāpatir akāmayata
GSP33ramvaspu:730: prajāḥ sṛjeyeti patiṃ viśvasyātmeśvaraṃ śvāstaṃ śivam acyutaṃ tam īśvarāṇāṃ paraṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:731: maheśvaraṃ taṃ devatānāṃ paraṃ ca daivataṃ sarvasya vaśī sarvasyeśāna ityādikā brahmaṇaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:732: sarvasmād anyatvaṃ sarvasyeśitavyam īśvaratvaṃ ca brahmaṇaḥ sarvasya śeṣatāṃ patitvaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:734: antaḥ praviṣṭaḥ śāstā janānāṃ sarvātmā eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ yasyāpaḥ śarīraṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:735: yasya tejaḥ śarīram ityādi yasyāvyaktaṃ śarīraṃ yasyākṣaraṃ śarīraṃ yasya mṛtyuḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:736: śarīraṃ yasyātmā śarīram iti brahmavyatiriktasya sarvasya vastuno brahmaṇaś ca śarīrātmabhāvaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:738: nānārūpāṇāṃ vākyānām avirodho mukhyārthāparityāgaś ca yathā saṃbhavati tathā varṇanīyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:739: varṇitaṃ ca avikāraśrutayaḥ svarūpapariṇāmaparihārād eva mukhyārthāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:741: nānātvaniṣedhavādāś caikasya brahmaṇaḥ śarīratayā prakārabhūtaṃ sarvaṃ cetanācetanaṃ vastv iti sarvasyātmatayā sarvaprakāraṃ brahmaivāvasthitam iti surakṣitāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:743: jñānānandamātravādi ca sarvasmād anyasya sarvakalyāṇaguṇagaṇāśrayasya sarveśvarasya
GSP33ramvaspu:746: eveti svaprakāśatayā svarūpam api jñānam eveti ca pratipādanād anupālitam /
GSP33ramvaspu:747: aikyavādāś ca śarīrātmabhāvena sāmānādhikaraṇyamukhyārthatopapādanād eva susthitāḥ / (85)
GSP33ramvaspu:748: evaṃ ca saty abhedo vā bhedo vā dvyātmakatā vā vedāntavedyaḥ ko 'yam arthaḥ samarthito bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:750: sarvaśarīratayā sarvaprakāraṃ brahmaivāvasthitam ity abhedaḥ samarthitaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:751: ekam eva brahma nānābhūtacidacidvastuprakāraṃ nānātvenāvasthitam iti bhedābhedau /
GSP33ramvaspu:752: acidvastunaś cidvastunaś ceśvarasya ca svarūpasvabhāvavailakṣaṇyād asaṃkarāc ca bhedaḥ samarthitaḥ / (86)
GSP33ramvaspu:753: nanu ca tat tvam asi śvetaketo tasya tāvad eva ciram ity aikyajñānam eva paramapuruṣārthalakṣaṇamokṣasādhanam iti gamyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:755: pṛthagātmānaṃ preritāraṃ ca matvā juṣṭas tatas tenāmṛtatvam etīty ātmānaṃ preritāraṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:756: cāntaryāmiṇaṃ pṛthag matvā tataḥ pṛthaktvajñānād dhetos tena paramātmanā juṣṭo 'mṛtatvam
GSP33ramvaspu:757: etīti sākṣādamṛtatvaprāptisādhanam ātmano niyantuś ca pṛthagbhāvajñānam evety avagamyate / (87)
GSP33ramvaspu:758: aikyavākyavirodhād etadaparamārthasaguṇabrahmaprāptiviṣayam ity abhyupagantavyam iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:759: pṛthaktvajñānasyaiva sākṣādamṛtatvaprāptisādhanatvaśravaṇād viparītaṃ kasmān na bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:761: dvayor tulyayor virodhe saty avirodhena tayor viṣayo vivecanīya iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:763: antaryāmirūpeṇāvasthitasya parasya brahmaṇaḥ śarīratayā prakāratvāj jīvātmanas tatprakāraṃ brahmaiva tvam iti śabdenābhidhīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:764: tathaiva jñātavyam iti tasya vākyasya viṣayaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:765: evaṃbhūtāj jīvāt tadātmatayāvasthitasya paramātmano nikhiladoṣarahitatayā satyasaṃkalpatvād
GSP33ramvaspu:767: ity asya vākyasya viṣaya ity ayam arthaḥ pūrvam asakṛduktaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:768: bhoktā bhogyaṃ preritāraṃ ca matveti bhogyarūpasya vastuno 'cetanatvaṃ paramārthatvaṃ satataṃ vikārāspadatvam ityādayaḥ svabhāvāḥ,
GSP33ramvaspu:770: bhogyabhūtācidvastusaṃsargaś ca paramātmopāsanān mokṣaś cetyādayaḥ svabhāvāḥ,
GSP33ramvaspu:771: evaṃbhūtabhoktṛbhogyayor antaryāmirūpeṇāvasthānaṃ svarūpeṇa cāparimitaguṇaughāśrayatvenāvasthānam iti parasya brahmas trividhāvasthānaṃ jñātavyam ityarthaḥ // (88)
GSP33ramvaspu:772: tat tvam asīti sadvidyāyām upāsyaṃ brahma saguṇaṃ saguṇabrahmaprāptiś ca phalam ity abhiyuktaiḥ pūrvācāryair vyākhyātam /
GSP33ramvaspu:774: vyākhyātaṃ ca dramiḍācāryeṇa vidyāvikalpaṃ vadatā yady api saccito na nirbhugnadaivataṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:775: guṇagaṇaṃ manasānudhāvet tathāpy antarguṇām eva devatāṃ bhajata iti tatrāpi saguṇaiva
GSP33ramvaspu:778: na nirbhugnadaivataṃ guṇagaṇaṃ manasānudhāvet apahatapāpmatvādikalyāṇaguṇagaṇaṃ daivatād vibhaktaṃ yady api daharavidyāniṣṭha iva saccito na smaret /
GSP33ramvaspu:779: tathāpy antarguṇām eva devatāṃ bhajate devatāsvarūpānubandhitvāt sakalakalyāṇaguṇagaṇasya
GSP33ramvaspu:782: ataḥ saguṇam eva brahma tatrāpi prāpyam iti sadvidyādaharavidyayor vikalpa ityarthaḥ / (89)
GSP33ramvaspu:783: nanu ca sarvasya jantoḥ paramātmāntaryāmī tanniyāmyaṃ ca sarvam evety uktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:784: evaṃ ca sati vidhiniṣedhaśāstrāṇām adhikārī na dṛśyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:785: yaḥ svabuddhyaiva pravṛttinivṛttiśaktaḥ sa evaṃ kuryān na kuryād iti vidhiniṣedhayogyaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:787: sarvasmin pravṛttijāte sarvasya prerakaḥ paramātmā kārayiteti tasya sarvaniyamanaṃ pratipāditam /
GSP33ramvaspu:788: tathā ca śrūyate eṣa eva sādhu karma kārayati te yam ebhyo lokebhya unninīṣati /
GSP33ramvaspu:789: eṣa evāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam adho ninīṣatīti /
GSP33ramvaspu:791: atrocyate sarveṣām eva cetanānāṃ cicchaktiyogaḥ pravṛttiśaktiyoga ityādi sarvaṃ pravṛttinivṛttiparikaraṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:792: sāmānyena saṃvidhāya tannirvahaṇāya tadādhāro bhūtvāntaḥ praviśyānumantṛtayā ca niyamanaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:793: kurvañ śeṣitvenāvasthitaḥ paramātmaitadāhitaśaktiḥ sanpravṛttinivṛttyādi svayam eva kurute /
GSP33ramvaspu:796: sādhvasādhukarmaṇoḥ kārayitṛtvaṃ tu vyavasthitaviṣayaṃ na sarvasādhāraṇam /
GSP33ramvaspu:797: yas tu sarvaṃ svayam evātimātram ānukūlye pravṛttas taṃ prati prītaḥ svayam eva bhagavān kalyāṇabuddhiyogadānaṃ kurvan kalyāṇe pravartayati
GSP33ramvaspu:798: yaḥ punar atimātraṃ prātikūlye pravṛttas tasya krūrāṃ buddhiṃ dadan svayam eva krūreṣv eva karmasu prerayati bhagavān /
GSP33ramvaspu:801: dadāmi buddhiyogaṃ taṃ yena mām upayānti te //
GSP33ramvaspu:804: tān ahaṃ dviṣataḥ krūrān saṃsāreṣu narādhamān /
GSP33ramvaspu:805: kṣipāmy ajasram aśubhān āsurīṣv eva yoniṣu // iti / (91)
GSP33ramvaspu:815: vidyāṃ cāvidyāṃ ca yas tad vedobhyaṃ saha /
GSP33ramvaspu:817: iti/ atrāvidyāśabdena vidyetaratvād varṇāśramācārādi pūrvoktaṃ karmocyate vidyāśabdena ca bhaktirūpāpannaṃ dhyānam ucyate / yathoktam
GSP33ramvaspu:820: iti / tam evaṃ vidvān amṛta iha bhavati nānyaḥ panthā ayanāya vidyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:821: ya enaṃ vidur amṛtās te bhavanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:823: so yo ha vai tat paraṃ veda brahma veda brahmaiva bhavatītyādi /
GSP33ramvaspu:826: tad eva dhyānaṃ punar api viśinaṣṭi nāyam ātmā pravacanena labhyo na medhayā na bahudhā śrutena /
GSP33ramvaspu:827: yam evaiṣa vṛṇute tena labhyas tasyaiṣa ātmā vivṛṇute tanūṃ svām iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:830: etad uktaṃ bhavati yo 'yaṃ mumukṣur vedāntavihitavedanarūpadhyānādiniṣṭho yadā tasya tasminn evānudhyāne niravadhikātiśayā prītir jāyate tadaiva tena labhyate paraḥ puruṣa iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:832: puruṣaḥ sa paraḥ pārtha bhaktyā labhyas tv ananyayā /
GSP33ramvaspu:834: jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ ca tattvena praveṣṭaṃ ca paraṃtapa //
GSP33ramvaspu:835: bhaktyā mām abhijānāti yāvān yaś cāsmi tattvataḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:836: tato māṃ tattvato jñātvā viśate tadanantaram //
GSP33ramvaspu:837: iti / tadanantaraṃ tata eva bhaktito viśata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:839: tad yukta eva tena pareṇātmanā varaṇīyo bhavatīti tena labhyata iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:844: iti / nikhilajagaduddhāraṇāyāvanitale 'vatīrṇaḥ parabrahmabhūtaḥ puruṣottamaḥ svayam evaitaduktavān
GSP33ramvaspu:846: yataḥ pravṛttir bhūtānāṃ yena sarvam idaṃ tatam /
GSP33ramvaspu:847: svakarmaṇā tam abhyarcya siddhiṃ vindati mānavaḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:851: vedāvalambinām api yathāvasthitavastuviparyayas tāḍṛśāṃ bāhyasāmyaṃ manunaivoktam
GSP33ramvaspu:852: yo vedabāhyāḥ smṛtayo yāś ca kāś ca kudṛṣṭayaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:853: sarvas tā niṣphalāḥ pretya tamoniṣṭhā hi tāḥ smṛtāḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:854: iti / rajastamobhyām aspṛṣṭam uttamaṃ sattvam eva yeṣāṃ svābhāviko guṇas teṣām eva vaidikī rucir vedārthayāthātmyāvabodhaś cetyarthaḥ / (94)
GSP33ramvaspu:856: saṃkīrṇāḥ sāttvikāś caiva rājasās tāmasās tathā /
GSP33ramvaspu:857: iti / kecid brahmakalpāḥ saṃkīrṇāḥ kecit sattvaprāyāḥ kecid rajaḥprāyā kecit tamaḥprāyā
GSP33ramvaspu:858: iti kalpavibhāgam uktvā sattvarajastamomayānāṃ tattvānāṃ māhātmyavarṇanaṃ ca tattatkalpaproktapurāṇeṣu
GSP33ramvaspu:860: yasmin kalpe tu yat proktaṃ purāṇaṃ brahmaṇā purā /
GSP33ramvaspu:861: tasya tasya tu māhātmyaṃ tatsvarūpeṇa varṇyate //
GSP33ramvaspu:864: rājaseṣu ca māhātmyam adhikaṃ brahmaṇo viduḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:865: sāttvikeṣu ca kalpeṣu māhātmyam adhikaṃ hareḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:866: teṣv eva yogasaṃsiddhā gamiṣyanti parāṃ gatim //
GSP33ramvaspu:868: ityādi / etaduktaṃ bhavati ādikṣetrajñatvād brahmaṇas tasyāpi keṣucid ahassu sattvamudrikaṃ keṣucid rajaḥ keṣucit tamaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:870: na tad asti pṛthivyāṃ vā divi deveṣu vā punaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:871: sattvaṃ prakṛtijair muktaṃ yad ebhiḥ syāt tribhir guṇaiḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:872: iti / yo brahmaṇaṃ vidadhati pūrvaṃ yo vai vedāṃś ca prahiṇoti tasmā iti śruteḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:873: brahmaṇo 'pi sṛjyatvena śāstravaśyatvena ca kṣetrajñatvaṃ gamyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:874: sattvaprāyeṣv ahassu taditareṣu yāni purāṇāni brahmaṇā proktāni teṣāṃ parasparavirodhe
GSP33ramvaspu:875: sati sāttvikāhaḥproktam eva purāṇaṃ yathārthaṃ tadvirodhyanyad ayathārtham iti purāṇanirṇayāyaivedaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:878: sattvāt saṃjāyate jñānaṃ rajaso lobha eva ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:880: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca kāryākārye bhayābhaye /
GSP33ramvaspu:881: bandhaṃ mokṣaṃ ca yā vetti buddhiḥ sā pārtha sāttvikī //
GSP33ramvaspu:882: yathā dharmam adharmaṃ ca kāryaṃ cākāryam eva ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:883: ayathāvat prajānāti buddhiḥ sā pārtha rājasī //
GSP33ramvaspu:884: adharmaṃ dharmam iti yā manyate tamasāvṛtā /
GSP33ramvaspu:885: sarvārthān viparītāṃś ca buddhiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī //
GSP33ramvaspu:887: sarvān purāṇārthān brahmaṇaḥ sakāśād adhigamyaiva sarvāṇi purāṇāni purāṇakārāś cakruḥ / yathoktam
GSP33ramvaspu:891: apauruṣeyeṣu vedavākyeṣu parasparaviruddheṣu katham iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:893: yad api ced evaṃ viruddhavad dṛśyate prāṇaṃ manasi saha kāraṇair nādānte paramātmani saṃpratiṣṭhāya dhyāyītavyaṃ pradhyāyītavyaṃ sarvam idaṃ,
GSP33ramvaspu:897: sarvāiśvaryasaṃpannaḥ sarveśvaraḥ śaṃbhur ākāśamadhye dhyeyaḥ yasmāt paraṃ nāparam
GSP33ramvaspu:898: asti kiṃcid yasmān nāṇīyo na jyāyo 'sti kaścit vṛkṣa iva stabdho divi tiṣṭhaty ekas
GSP33ramvaspu:899: tenedaṃ pūrṇaṃ puruṣeṇa sarvam tato yaduttarataraṃ tadarūpam anāmayaṃ ya etadvidur amṛtās te bhavanti,
GSP33ramvaspu:902: sarvavyāpī ca bhagavāṃs tasmāt sarvagataḥ śivaḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:903: yadā tamas tan na divā na rātrir na san na cāsac chiva eva kevalaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:904: tadakṣaraṃ tatsavitur vareṇyaṃ prajñā ca tasmāt prasṛtā purāṇī //
GSP33ramvaspu:905: ityādi nārāyaṇaḥ paraṃ brahmeti ca pūrvam eva pratipāditaṃ,
GSP33ramvaspu:910: janmādyasya yataḥ yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante,
GSP33ramvaspu:913: tad vijijñānasva tad brahmeti jagajjanmādikāraṇaṃ brahmety avagamyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:915: sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ekam evādvitīyam iti jagadupādānatājagannimittatājagadantaryāmitādimukhena paramakāraṇaṃ sacchabdena praitpāditaṃ brahmety avagatam /
GSP33ramvaspu:916: ayam evārthaḥ brahma vā idam ekam evāgra āsīd iti śākhāntare brahmaśabdena pratipaditaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:918: ayam evārthas tathā śākhāntara ātmā vā idam eka evāgra āsīn nānyat kiṃcana miṣad iti sadbrahmaśabdābhyām ātmaivābhihita ity avagamyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:919: tathā ca śākhāntara eko ha vai nārāyaṇa āsīn na brahma neśāno neme dyāvapṛthivī na nakṣatrāṇīti sadbrahmātmādiparamakāraṇavādibhiḥ śabdair nārāyaṇa evābhidhīyata iti niścīyate / (97)
GSP33ramvaspu:920: yam antaḥ samudre kavayo vayantītyādi nainam ūrdhvaṃ na tiryañcaṃ na madhye parijagrabhat /
GSP33ramvaspu:921: na tasyeśe kaścana tasya nāma mahadyaśaḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:922: na saṃdṛśe tiṣṭhati rūpam asya na cakṣuṣā paśyati kaścanainam,
GSP33ramvaspu:923: hṛdā manīṣā manasābhikḷpto ya evaṃ vidur amṛtās te bhavantīti sarvasmāt paratvam asya pratipādya,
GSP33ramvaspu:924: na tasyeśe kaścaneti tasmāt paraṃ kim api na vidyata iti ca pratiṣidhya,
GSP33ramvaspu:925: adbhyaḥ sambhūto hiraṇyagarbha ityaṣṭāv iti tenaikavākyatāṃ gamayati /
GSP33ramvaspu:926: tac ca mahāpuruṣaprakaraṇaṃ hrīś ca te lakṣmīś ca patnyāv iti ca nārāyaṇa eveti dyotayati / (98)
GSP33ramvaspu:928: sahasraśīrṣaṃ devam ityārabhya sa brahma sa śivaḥ sendraḥ so 'kṣaraḥ paramaḥ svarāḍ iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:930: tattadguṇayogena nārāyaṇa eva prayujya tadvyatiriktasya samastasya tadādhāratāṃ tanniyāmyatāṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:931: taccheṣatām tadātmakatāṃ ca pratipādya brahmaśivayor apīndrādisamānākāratayā tadvibhūtitvaṃ ca pratipāditam /
GSP33ramvaspu:932: idaṃ ca vākyaṃ kevalaparatattvapratipādanaikaparam anyat kiṃcid apy atra na vidhīyate / (99)
GSP33ramvaspu:933: asmin vākye pratipāditasya sarvasmāt paratvenāvasthitasya brahmaṇo vākyāntareṣu brahmavid āpnoti param ityādiṣūpāsanādi vidhīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:934: ataḥ prāṇaṃ manasi saha karaṇair ityādi vākyaṃ sarvakāraṇe paramātmani karaṇaprāṇādi
GSP33ramvaspu:935: sarvaṃ vikārajātam upasaṃhṛtya tam eva paramātmānaṃ sarvasyeśānaṃ dhyāyīteti parabrahmabhūtanārāyaṇasyaiva dhyānaṃ vidadhāti / (100)
GSP33ramvaspu:936: patiṃ viśvasyeti na tasyeśe kaścaneti ca tasyaiva sarvasyeśānatā pratipāditā /
GSP33ramvaspu:937: ata eva sarvāiśvaryasaṃpannaḥ sarveśvaraḥ śaṃbhurākāśamadhye dhyeya iti nārāyaṇasyaiva paramakāraṇasya śaṃbhuśabdavācyasya dhyānaṃ vidhīyate
GSP33ramvaspu:938: kaś ca dhyeya ityārabhya kāraṇaṃ tu dhyeya iti kāryasyādhyeyatāpūrvakakāraṇaikadhyeyatāparatvād vākyasya /
GSP33ramvaspu:939: tasyaiva nārāyaṇasya paramakāraṇatā śaṃbhuśabdavācyatā ca paramakāraṇapratipādanaikapare
GSP33ramvaspu:940: nārāyaṇānuvāka eva pratipanneti tadvirodhyarthāntaraparikalpanaṃ kāraṇasyaiva dhyeyatvena
GSP33ramvaspu:942: yad api tato yaduttaram ity atra puruṣād anyasya parataratvaṃ pratīyata ityabhyadhāyi
GSP33ramvaspu:943: tad api yasmāt paraṃ nāparam asti kiṃcid yasmān nāṇīyo na jyāyo 'sti kaścit yasmād
GSP33ramvaspu:944: aparaṃ yasmād anyat kiṃcid api paraṃ nāsti kenāpi prakāreṇa puruṣavyatiriktasya paratvaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:947: sarvavyāpitvāt sarveśvaratvād asyaitadvyatirikitasya kasyāpy aṇīyastvaṃ jyāyastvaṃ ca nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:948: yasmān nāṇīyo na jyāyo 'sti kaścid iti puruṣād anyasya kasyāpi jyāyastvaṃ niṣiddham iti tasmād anyasya paratvaṃ na yujyata iti pratyuktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:950: asya prakaraṇasyopakrame tam eva viditvātimṛtyum eti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāyāiti
GSP33ramvaspu:951: puruṣavedanasyāmṛtatvahetutāṃ tadvyatiriktasyāpathatāṃ ca pratijñāya yasmāt paraṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:952: nāparam asti kiṃcit tenedaṃ pūrṇaṃ puruṣeṇa sarvam ity etad antena sarvasmāt paratvaṃ pratipāditam /
GSP33ramvaspu:953: yataḥ puruṣatattvam evottarataraṃ tato yaduttarataraṃ puruṣatattvaṃ tad evārūpam anāmayaṃ ya etadvidur amṛtās te bhavanti,
GSP33ramvaspu:954: athetare duḥkham evāpiyantīti puruṣavedanasyāmṛtatvahetutvaṃ taditarasyāpathatvaṃ pratijñātaṃ sahetukam upasaṃhṛtam /
GSP33ramvaspu:956: puruṣasyaiva śuddhiguṇayogena śivaśabdābhiprāyatvaṃ śāśvataṃ śivam acyutam ityādinā jñātam eva /
GSP33ramvaspu:957: puruṣa eva śivaśabdābhidheya ityanantaram eva vadati mahān prabhur vai puruṣaḥ sattvasyaiṣa pravartaka iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:958: uktenaiva nyāyena na san na cāsac chiva eva kevala ityādi sarvaṃ neyam / (103)
GSP33ramvaspu:959: kiṃca na tasyeśe kaścaneti nirastasamābhyadhikasaṃbhāvanasya puruṣasyāṇor aṇīyānityasminn
GSP33ramvaspu:962: ayam arthaḥ sarvasya vedajātasya prakṛtiḥ praṇava uktaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:966: tasya praṇavaprakṛtibhūtasyākārasya yaḥ paro vācyaḥ sa eva maheśvara iti sarvavācakajātaprakṛtibhūtākāravācyaḥ sarvavācyajātaprakṛtibhūtanārāyaṇo yaḥ sa maheśavara ityarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:968: ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayas tathā /
GSP33ramvaspu:971: iti / a iti brahmeti ca śruteḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:972: akāro vai sarvā vāg iti ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:974: ato brahmaṇo 'kāravācyatāpratipādanād akāravācyo nārāyaṇa eva maheśvara iti siddham / (104)
GSP33ramvaspu:975: tasyaiva sahasraśīrṣaṃ devam iti kevalaparatattvaviśeṣapratipādanapareṇa nārāyaṇānuvākena sarvasmāt paratvaṃ prapañcitam /
GSP33ramvaspu:976: anenānanyapareṇa pratipāditam eva paratattvam anyapareṣu sarvavākyeṣu kenāpi śabdena
GSP33ramvaspu:977: pratīyamānaṃ tad evety avagamya iti śāstradṛṣtyā tūpadeśo vāmadevavad iti sūtrakāreṇa nirṇītam /
GSP33ramvaspu:978: tad etat paraṃ brahma kvacid brahmaśivādiśabdād avagatam iti kevalabrahmaśivayor na paratvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:980: kvacid ākāśaprāṇādiśabdena paraṃ brahmābhihitam iti bhūtākāśaprāṇāder yathā na paratvam /
GSP33ramvaspu:981: yat punar idam āśaṅkitam atha yad idam asmin brahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma
GSP33ramvaspu:982: daharo 'sminn antarākāśas tasmin yad antas tad anveṣṭavyaṃ tad vā va vijijñāsitavyam
GSP33ramvaspu:983: ity atrākāśaśabdena jagadupādānakāraṇaṃ pratipādya tadantarvartinaḥ kasyacit tattvaviśeṣasyānveṣṭavyatā pratipādyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:984: asyākāśasya nāmarūpayor nivoḍhṛtvaśravaṇāt puruṣasūkte puruṣasya nāmarūpayoḥ kartṛtvadarśanāc
GSP33ramvaspu:987: yatas tatra śrutir evāsya parihāram āha /
GSP33ramvaspu:988: vākyakāraś ca daharo 'sminn antarākāśaḥ kiṃ tad atra vidyate yad anveṣṭavyaṃ yad
GSP33ramvaspu:989: vā va vijijñāsitavyam iti codite yāvān vā ayam ākāśas tāvān eṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśa
GSP33ramvaspu:991: ca pratipādya tasmin kāmāḥ samāhitā iti kāmaśabdenāpahatapāpmatvādisatyasaṃkalpaparyantaguṇāṣṭakaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:993: tasmin yad antas tadanveṣṭavyam ityuktam iti śrutyaiva sarvaṃ parihṛtam / (106)
GSP33ramvaspu:994: etad uktaṃ bhavati kiṃ tad atra vidyate yad aneṣṭavyam ity asya codyasya tasmin sarvasya
GSP33ramvaspu:995: jagataḥ sraṣṭṛtvam ādhāratvaṃ niyantṛtvaṃ śeṣitvam apahatapāpmatvādayo guṇāś ca vidyanta iti parihāra iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:996: tathā ca vākyakāravacanam tasmin yad antar iti kāmavyapadeśa iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:999: etad uktaṃ bhavati yad etad daharākāśaśabdābhidheyaṃ nikhilajagadudayavaibhavalayalīlaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:1000: paraṃ brahma tasmin yad antar nihitam anavadhikātiśayam apahatapāpmatvādiguṇāṣṭakaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:1001: tad ubhayam apy anveṣṭavyaṃ vijijñāsitavyam iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1002: yathāha atha ya ihātmānam anuvidya vrajanty etāṃś ca satyān kāmāṃs teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavantīti / (107)
GSP33ramvaspu:1003: yaḥ punaḥ kāraṇasyaiva dhyeyatāpratipādanapare vākye viṣṇor ananyaparavākyapratipāditaparatattvabhūtasya
GSP33ramvaspu:1004: kāryamadhye niveśaḥ sa svakāryabhūtatattvasaṃkhyāpūraṇaṃ kurvataḥ svalīlayā jagadupakārāya
GSP33ramvaspu:1006: yathā līlayā devasaṃkhyāpūrṇaṃ kurvata upendratvaṃ parasyaiva,
GSP33ramvaspu:1007: yathā ca sūryavaṃśodbhavarājasaṃkhyāpūrṇaṃ kurvataḥ parasyaiva brahmaṇo dāśarathirūpeṇa svecchāvatāraḥ,
GSP33ramvaspu:1008: yathā ca somavaṃśasaṃkhyāpūraṇaṃ kurvato bhagavato bhūbhārāvatāraṇāya svecchayā vasudevagṛhe 'vatāraḥ / (108)
GSP33ramvaspu:1009: sṛṣṭipralayaprakaraṇeṣu nārāyaṇa eva paramakāraṇatayā pratipādyata iti pūrvam evoktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1010: yat punar atharvaśirasi rudreṇa svasarvāiśvaryaṃ prapañcitaṃ tat so 'ntarād antaraṃ prāviśad iti paramātmapraveśād uktam iti śrutyaiva vyaktam
GSP33ramvaspu:1011: śāstradṛṣṭyā tūpadeśo vāmadevavad iti sūtrakāreṇaivaṃvādinām arthaḥ pratipāditaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1014: mattaḥ sarvam ahaṃ sarvaṃ mayi sarvaṃ sanātane //
GSP33ramvaspu:1015: ityādi / atra sarvagatvād anantasyeti hetur uktaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1016: svaśarīrabhūtasya sarvasya cidacidvastuna ātmatvena sarvagaḥ paramātmeti sarve śabdāḥ sarvaśarīraṃ paramātmānam evābhidadhatīty uktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1017: ato 'ham iti śabdaḥ svātmaprakāraprakāriṇaṃ paramātmānam evācaṣṭe /
GSP33ramvaspu:1019: ātmety eva tu gṛhṇīyāt sarvasya tanniṣpatter ityādināhaṃgrahaṇopāsanaṃ vākyakāreṇa
GSP33ramvaspu:1020: kāryāvasthaḥ kāraṇāvasthaś ca sthūlasūkṣmacidacidvastuśarīraḥ paramātmaiveti sarvasya
GSP33ramvaspu:1022: ātmeti tūpagacchanti grāhayanti ceti sūtrakāreṇa ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:1023: mahābhārate ca brahmarudrasaṃvāde brahmā rudraṃ prayāha
GSP33ramvaspu:1024: tavāntarātmā mama ca ye cānye dehisaṃjñitāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1025: iti / rudrasya brahmaṇaś cānyeṣāṃ ca dehināṃ parameśvaro nārāyaṇo 'ntarātmatayāvasthita iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1033: nimittopādānayos tu bhedaṃ vadanto vedabāhyā eva syuḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1034: janmādyasya yataḥ prakṛtiś ca pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparodhād ityādi vedavitpraṇītasūtravirodhāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:1035: sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ekam evādvitīyam tad aikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti brahmavanaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:1036: brahma sa vṛkṣa āsīd yato dyāvāpṛthivī niṣṭatakṣuḥ brahmādhyatiṣṭhadbhuvanāni dhārayan
GSP33ramvaspu:1037: sarve nimeṣā jajñire vidyutaḥ puruṣādadhi na tasyeśe kaścana tasya nāma mahadyaśaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:1038: neha nānāsti kiṃcana sarvasya vaśī sarvasyeśānaḥ puruṣa evedaṃ sarvaṃ yad bhūtaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:1039: yac ca bhavyam utāmṛtattvasyeśānaḥ nānyaḥ panthā ayanāya vidyata ityādisarvaśrutivirodhāc ca / (110)
GSP33ramvaspu:1040: itihāsapurāṇeṣu ca sṛṣṭisthitipralayaprakaraṇayor idam eva paratattvam ity avagamyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1043: pralaye ca kam abhyeti tan to brūhi pitāmaha //
GSP33ramvaspu:1050: idam eva paryāptam ity avigānaparigṛhītaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ ca purāṇaṃ janmādy asya yata
GSP33ramvaspu:1052: tajjanmādikāraṇaṃ kim iti praśnapūrvakaṃ viṣṇoḥ sakāśād bhūtam ityādinā brahmasvarūpaviśeṣapratipādanaikaparatayā pravṛttam iti sarvasaṃmatam
GSP33ramvaspu:1055: puruṣaś ca+py ubhāv etau līyete paramātmani //
GSP33ramvaspu:1057: viṣṇunāmā sa vedeṣu vedānteṣu ca gīyate //
GSP33ramvaspu:1058: iti / sarvavedavedānteṣu sarvaiḥ śabdaiḥ paramakāraṇatayāyam eva gīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1059: yathā sarvāsu ṣrutiṣu kevalaparabrahmasvarūpaviśeṣapratipādanāyaiva pravṛtto nārāyaṇānuvākas tathedaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ ca purāṇam
GSP33ramvaspu:1060: so 'ham icchāmi dharmajña śrotuṃ tvatto yathā jagat /
GSP33ramvaspu:1061: babhūva bhūyaś ca yathā mahābhāga bhaviṣyati //
GSP33ramvaspu:1063: līnam āsīd yathā yatra layam eṣyati yatra ca //
GSP33ramvaspu:1064: iti paraṃ brahma kim iti prakramya
GSP33ramvaspu:1065: viṣṇoḥ sakāśād udbhūtaṃ jagat tatraiva ca sthitam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1070: varjitaḥ śakyate vaktuṃ yaḥ sad astīti kevalam //
GSP33ramvaspu:1071: sarvatrāsau samastaṃ ca vasaty atreti vai yataḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1073: tadbrahma paraṃ nityam ajam akṣayam avyayam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1074: ekasvarūpaṃ ca sadā heyābhāvāc ca nirmalam //
GSP33ramvaspu:1077: sa sarvabhūtaprakṛtiṃ vikārān guṇādidoṣāṃś ca mune vyatītaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1082: paraḥ parāṇāṃ sakalā na yatra kleśādayaḥ santi parāvareśe //
GSP33ramvaspu:1085: saṃjñāyate yena tad astadoṣaṃ śuddhaṃ paraṃ nirmalam ekarūpam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1086: saṃdṛśyate vāpy adhigamyate vā tajjñānam ajñānam ato 'nyad uktam //
GSP33ramvaspu:1093: sa saṃjñā yāti bhagavān eka janārdanaḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:1096: eka eva janārdana iti jana ardanasyaiva brahmaśivādikṛtsnaprapañcatādātmyaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1097: jagac ca sa iti pūrvoktam eva vivṛṇoti sraṣṭā sṛjati cātmānaṃ viṣṇuḥ pālyaṃ ca pāti ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:1099: iti ca sraṣṭṛtvenāvasthitaṃ brahmaṇaṃ sṛjyaṃ ca saṃhartāraṃ saṃhāryaṃ ca yugapan
GSP33ramvaspu:1100: nirdiśya sarvasya viṣṇutādātmyopadeśāt sṛjyasaṃhāryabhūtād vastunaḥ sraṣṭṛsaṃhartror
GSP33ramvaspu:1103: ata eva svecchayā līlārthaṃ vibhūtyantarbhāva ucyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1105: pṛthivyāpas tathā tejo vāyur ākāśa eva ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:1109: sa eva sṛjyaḥ sa ca sarvakartā sa eva pātyatti ca pālyate ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:1110: brahmādyavasthābhir aśeṣamūrtir viṣṇur variṣṭho varado vareṇyaḥ // iti / (113)
GSP33ramvaspu:1112: samastakalyāṇaguṇātmakasya brahmaṇaḥ katham upapadyata ity āśaṅkhya sa eva sarvabhūtātmā
GSP33ramvaspu:1114: sa eva sarveśvaraḥ parabrahmabhūto viṣṇur eva sarvaṃ jagad iti pratijñāya sarvabhūtātmā viśvarūpo yato 'vyaya iti hetur uktaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1115: sarvabhūtānām ayam ātmā viśvaśarīro yato 'vyaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1116: vakṣyati ca satsarvaṃ vai hares tanur iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1118: asyāvyayasyāpi parasya brahmaṇo viṣṇor viśvaśarīratayā tādātmyaviruddham ity ātmaśarīrayoś ca svabhāvā vyavasthitā eva /
GSP33ramvaspu:1119: evaṃbhūtasya sarveśvarasya viṣṇoḥ prapañcāntarbhūtaniyāmyakoṭiniviṣṭabrahmādidevatiryaṅmanuṣyeṣu tat tat samāśrayaṇīyatvāya svecchāvatāraḥ pūrvoktaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:1120: tad etad brahmādīnāṃ bhāvanātrayānvayena karmavaśyatvaṃ bhagavataḥ parabrahmabhūtasya
GSP33ramvaspu:1121: vāsudevasya nikhilajagadupakārāya svecchayā svenaiva rūpeṇa devādiṣv avatāra iti
GSP33ramvaspu:1123: asya devādirūpeṇāvatāreṣv api na prākṛto deha iti mahābhārate na bhūtasaṃghasaṃsthāno deho 'sya paramātmanaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1125: śrutibhiś ca ajāyamāno bahudhā vijāyate tasya dhīrāḥ parijānanti yonim iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1127: ayaṃ tu sarveśvaraḥ satyasaṃkalpo bhagavān evaṃbhūtaśubhetarajanmākurvann api svecchayā svenaiva niratiśayakalyāṇarūpeṇa devādiṣu jagadupakārāya bahudhā jāyate,
GSP33ramvaspu:1128: tasyaitasya śubhetarajanmākurvato 'pi svakalyāṇaguṇānantyena bahudhā yoniṃ bahuvidhajanma dhīrādhīramatām agresarā jānantītyarthaḥ / (114)
GSP33ramvaspu:1129: tadetannikhilajagannimittopādānabhūtāj janmādy asya yataḥ prakṛtiś ca pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparodhādityādisūtraiḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:1130: pratipāditāt parasmād brahmaṇaḥ paramapuruṣād anyasya kasyacit parataratvaṃ paramataḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:1131: setūn mānasaṃbandhabhedavyapadeśebhya ityāśaṅkya sāmānyāt tu buddhyarthaḥ pādavat
GSP33ramvaspu:1132: sthānaviśeṣāt prakāśādivat upapatteś ca tathānyapratiṣedhāt anena sarvagatatvamāyām
GSP33ramvaspu:1133: ādiśabdādibhya iti sūtrakāraḥ svayam eva nirākaroti / (115)
GSP33ramvaspu:1136: apa eva sasarjādau tāsu vīryam apāsṛjat //
GSP33ramvaspu:1139: tathā ca sraṣṭuḥ paramapuruṣasya tadvisṛṣṭasya ca brahmaṇaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:1140: ayaṃ tasya tāḥ pūrvaṃ tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1141: tadvisṛṣṭaḥ sa puruṣo loke brahmeti kīrtyate //
GSP33ramvaspu:1143: tathā ca vaiṣṇave purāṇe hiraṇyagarbhādīnāṃ bhāvanātrayānvayād aśuddhatvena śubhāśrayatvānarhatopapādanāt kṣetrajñatvaṃ niścīyate / (116)
GSP33ramvaspu:1144: yad api kaiścid uktam sarvasya śabdajātasya vidhyarthavādamantrarūpasya
GSP33ramvaspu:1146: vyavahārād anyatra śabdasya bodhakatvaśaktyavadhāraṇāsaṃbhavād vyavahārasya ca kāryabuddhimūlatvāt kāryarūpa eva śabdārthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1147: na pariniṣpanne vastuni śabdaḥ pramāṇam iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1149: pravartakavākyavyavahāra eva śabdānām arthabodhakatvaśaktyavadhāraṇaṃ kartavyam iti kim iyaṃ rājājñā /
GSP33ramvaspu:1151: tathā hi kenacid dhastaceṣṭādināpavarake daṇḍaḥ sthita iti devadattāya jñāpayeti preṣitaḥ kaścit tajjñāpane pravṛtto 'pavarake daṇḍaḥ sthita iti śabdaṃ prayuṅkte /
GSP33ramvaspu:1152: mūkavad dhastaceṣṭām imāṃ jānan pārśvastho 'nyaḥ prāgvyutpanno 'pi tasyārthasya bodhanāyāpavarake
GSP33ramvaspu:1153: daṇḍaḥ sthita ityasya śabdasya prayogadarśanād asyārthasyāyaṃ śabdo bodhaka iti jānātīti kim atra duṣkaram /
GSP33ramvaspu:1154: tathā bālas tāto 'yam iyaṃ mātāyaṃ mātulo 'yaṃ manuṣyo 'yaṃ mṛgaś candro 'yam ayaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:1155: ca sarpa iti mātāpitṛprabhṛtibhiḥ śabdaiḥ śanaiḥ śanair aṅgulyā nirdeśane tatra tatra
GSP33ramvaspu:1156: bahuśaḥ śikṣitas tair eva śabdais teṣv artheṣu svātmanaś ca buddhyutpattiṃ dṛṣṭvā
GSP33ramvaspu:1157: teṣv artheṣu teṣāṃ śabdānām aṅgulyā nirdeśapūrvakaḥ prayogaḥ sambandhāntarābhāvāt
GSP33ramvaspu:1158: saṃketayitṛpuruṣājñānāc ca bodhakatvanibandhana iti krameṇa niścitya punar apy asya
GSP33ramvaspu:1159: śabdasyāyam artha iti pūrvavṛddhaiḥ śikṣitaḥ sarvaśabdānām artham avagamya svayam
GSP33ramvaspu:1161: evam eva sarvapadānāṃ svārthābhidhāyitvaṃ saṃghātaviśeṣaṇāṃ ca yathāvasthitasaṃsargaviśeṣavācitvaṃ ca jānātīti kāryārthaiva vyuttipattir ityādinirbandho nirbandhanaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1162: ataḥ pariṣpannaḥ vastuni śabdasyabodhakatvaśaktyavadhāraṇāt sarvāṇi vedāntavākyāni sakalajagatkāraṇaṃ sarvakalyāṇaguṇākaramuktalakṣaṇaṃ brahma bodhayanty eva / (117)
GSP33ramvaspu:1163: api ca kāryārtha eva vyutpattir astu /
GSP33ramvaspu:1165: rātrisatrapratiṣṭhānādivad apagoraṇaśatayātanāsādhyasādhanabhāvavac ca karyopayogitayaiva sarvaṃ bodhayanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1167: brahmaprāptiḥ śrūyate paraprāptikāmo brahma vidyād ityatra prāpyatayā pratīyamānaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:1168: brahmasvarūpaṃ tadviśeṣaṇaṃ ca sarvaṃ kāryopayogitayaiva siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:1169: tadantargatam eva jagatsraṣṭṛtvaṃ saṃhartṛtvam ādhāratvam antarātmatvam ityādy uktam anuktaṃ ca sarvam iti na kiṃcid anupapannam / (118)
GSP33ramvaspu:1170: evaṃ ca sati mantrārthavādagatā hy aviruddhā apūrvāś cārthāḥ sarve vidhiśeṣatayaiva siddhā bhavanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1171: yathoktaṃ dramiḍabhāṣye ṛṇaṃ hi vai jāyata iti śruter ity upakramya yady apy avadānastutiparaṃ vākyaṃ tathāpi nāsatā stutir upapadyata iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1172: etad uktaṃ bhavati sarvo hy arthavādabhāgo devatārādhanabhūtayāgādeḥ sāṅgasyārādhyadevatāyāś cādṛṣṭarūpān guṇān sahasraśo vadan sahasraśaḥ karmaṇi prāśastyabuddhim utpādayati /
GSP33ramvaspu:1173: teṣām asadbhāve prāśastyabuddhir eva na syād iti karmaṇi prāśastyabuddhyarthaṃ guṇasadbhāvam eva bodhayatīti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1174: anayaiva diśā sarve mantrārthavādāvagatā arthāḥ siddhāḥ / (119)
GSP33ramvaspu:1175: api ca kāryavākyārthavādibhiḥ kim idaṃ kāryatvaṃ nāmeti vaktavyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1178: yad adhikṛtya kṛtir vartate tat kṛtyuddeśyatvam iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:1180: yatprāptīcchayā kṛtim utpādayati puruṣaḥ tat kṛtyuddeśyatvam iti ced dhanta tarhīṣṭatvam eva kṛtyuddeśyatvam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1183: tatra prerakatvākāraḥ kṛtyuddeśyatvam iti so 'yaṃ svapakṣābhiniveśakārito vṛthāśramaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1184: tathā hīcchāviṣayatayā pratītasya svaprayatnotpattim antareṇāsiddhir eva prerakatvam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1186: icchāyāṃ jātāyām iṣṭasya svaprayatnotpattim antareṇāsiddhiḥ pratīyate cet tataś cikīrṣā jāyate tataḥ pravartate puruṣa iti tattvavidāṃ prakriyā
GSP33ramvaspu:1187: tasmād iṣṭasya kṛtyadhīnātmalābhatvātireki kṛtyuddeśyatvaṃ nāma kim pi na dṛṣyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1193: ataḥ sukhavyatiriktasya kasyāpi puruṣānukūlatvaṃ na saṃbhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:1194: nanu ca duḥkhanivṛtter api sukhavyatiriktāyāḥ puruṣānukūlatā dṛṣṭā /
GSP33ramvaspu:1196: ātmānukūlaṃ sukham ātmapratikūlaṃ duḥkham iti hi sukhaduḥkhayor vivekaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1201: tathā hi prakṛtisaṃsṛṣṭasya saṃsāriṇaḥ puruṣasyānukūlasaṃyogaḥ pratikūlasaṃyogaḥ svarūpeṇāvasthitir iti ca tisro 'vasthāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1202: tatra pratikūlasaṃbandhanivṛttiś cānukūlasaṃbandhanivṛttiś ca svarūpeṇāvasthitir eva /
GSP33ramvaspu:1203: tasmāt pratikūlasaṃyoge vartamāne tannivṛttirūpā svarūpeṇāvasthitir apīṣṭā bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:1205: ataḥ sukharūpatvād anukūlatāyāḥ niyogasyānukūlatāṃ vadantaṃ prāmāṇikāḥ parihasanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1206: iṣṭasyārthaviśeṣasya nivartakatayaiva hi niyogasya niyogatvaṃ sthiratvam apūrvatvaṃ ca pratīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1207: svargakāmo yajetety atra kāryasya kriyātiriktā svargakāmapadasamabhivyāhāreṇa svargasādhanatvaniścayād eva bhavanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1208: na ca vācyaṃ yajetety atra prathamaṃ niyogaḥ svapradhānatayaiva pratīyate svargakāmapadasamabhivyāhārāt svasiddhaye svargasiddhyanukūlatā ca niyogasyeti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1210: svargakāmapadasamabhivyāhārād eva dhātvarthātirekiṇo niyogatvaṃ sthiratvam apūrvatvaṃ cetyādi /
GSP33ramvaspu:1212: samabhivyāhṛtasvargakāmapadārthānvayayogyaṃ svargasādhanam eva kāryaṃ liṅādayo 'bhidadhatīti lokavyutpattir api tiraskṛtā /
GSP33ramvaspu:1213: etad uktaṃ bhavati samabhivyahṛtapadāntaravācyārthānvayayogyam evetarapadapratipādyam ityanvitābhidhāyipadasaṃghātarūpavākyaśravaṇasaman antaram eva pratīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1215: ataḥ kriyāvad ananyārthatāpi virodhād eva parityakteti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1216: ata eva gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau ghoṣaprativāsayogyārthopasthāpanaparatvaṃ gaṅgāpadasyāśrīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1217: prathamaṃ gaṅgāpadena gaṅgārthaḥ smṛta iti gaṅgāpadārthasya peyatvaṃ na vākyārthānvayībhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:1218: evam atra api yajetetyetāvanmātraśravaṇe kāryam ananyārthaṃ smṛtam iti vākyārthānvayasamaye kāryasyānanyārthatā nāvatiṣṭhate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1219: kāryābhidhāyipadaśravaṇavelāyāṃ prathamaṃ kāryam ananyārthaṃ pratītam ity etad api na saṃgacchate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1221: ato niyogasya puruṣānukūlatvaṃ sarvalokaviruddhaṃ niyogasya sukharūpapuruṣānukūlatāṃ vadataḥ svānubhavavirodhaś ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:1222: karīryā vṛṣṭikāmo yajeytetyādiṣu siddhe 'pi niyoge vṛṣṭyādisiddhinimittasya vṛṣṭivyatirekeṇa niyogasyānukūlatā
GSP33ramvaspu:1224: yady apy asmiñ janmani vṛṣṭyādisiddher aniyamas tathāpy aniyamād eva niyogasiddhir avaśyāśrayaṇīyā /
GSP33ramvaspu:1226: evam uktarītyā kṛtisādhyeṣṭatvātireki kṛtyuddeśyatvaṃ na dṛśyate / (121)
GSP33ramvaspu:1227: kṛtiṃ prati śeṣitvaṃ kṛtyuddeśyatvam iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:1228: kim idaṃ śeṣitvaṃ kiṃ ca śeṣatvam iti vaktavyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1231: evaṃ tarhi kāryatvam eva śeṣitvam ity uktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:1238: kṛtiprayojanatvam iti cet puruṣasya kṛtyārambhaprayojanam eva hi kṛtiprayojanam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1239: sa cecchāviṣayaḥ kṛtyadhīnātmalābha iti pūrvokta eva /
GSP33ramvaspu:1241: paragatātiśayādhānecchopādeyatvam eva yasya svarūpaṃ sa śeṣaḥ paraḥ śeṣī /
GSP33ramvaspu:1242: phalotpattīcchayā yāgādes tatprayatnasya copādeyatvaṃ yāgādisiddhīcchayānyat sarvam upādeyam / (122)
GSP33ramvaspu:1243: evaṃ garbhadāsādīnām api puruṣaviśeṣātiśayādhānopādeyatvam eva svarūpam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1245: ca sarvasya vastunaḥ svarūpam iti sarvam īśvaraśeṣatvam eva sarvasya ceśvaraḥ śeṣīti
GSP33ramvaspu:1247: kṛtisādhyaṃ pradhānaṃ yat tatkāryam abhidhīyata ity ayam arthaḥ śraddadhāneṣv eva śobhate / (123)
GSP33ramvaspu:1248: api ca svargakāmo yajetetyādiṣu lakāravācyakartṛviśeṣasamarpaṇaparāṇāṃ svargakāmādipadānāṃ niyojyaviśeṣasamarpaṇaparatvaṃ śabdānuśāsanaviruddhaṃ kenāvagamyate /
