GSP33ramvaspu:1249: sādhyasvargaviśiṣṭasya svargasādhane kartṛtvānvayo na ghaṭata iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:1250: niyojyatvānvayo 'pi na ghaṭata iti hi svargasādhanatvaniścayaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1251: sa tu śāstrasiddhe kartṛtvānvaye svargasādhanatvaniścayaḥ kriyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1252: yathā bhoktukāmo devadattagṛhaṃ gacched ityukte bhojanakāmasya devadattagṛhagamane kartṛtvaśravaṇād eva prāgajñātam api bhojanasādhanatvaṃ devadattagṛhagamanasyāvagamyate
GSP33ramvaspu:1254: na kriyāntaraṃ prati kartṛtayā śrutasya kriyāntare kartṛtvakalpanaṃ yuktam yajeteti hi yāgakartṛtayā śrutasya biddhau kartṛtvakalpanaṃ kriyate
GSP33ramvaspu:1255: buddheḥ kartṛtvakalpanam eva hi niyojyatvam / yathoktaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:1258: devadattaḥ paced iti pāke kartṛtayā śrutasya devadattasya pākārthagamanaṃ pākānuguṇam iti gamane kartṛtvakalpanaṃ na yujyate / (124)
GSP33ramvaspu:1259: kiṃ ca liṅādiśabdavācyaṃ sthāyirūpaṃ kim ity apūrvam āśrīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1263: tasya svargakāmasya kālāntarabhāvisvargasiddhau kṣaṇabhaṅginī yāgādikriyā na samartheti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:1265: sarvaiḥ karmabhir ārādhitaḥ parameśvaro bhagavān nārāyaṇas tattadiṣṭaṃ phalaṃ dadātīti vedavido vadanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1266: yathāhur vedavidagresarā dramiḍācāryāḥ phalasaṃbibhatsayā hi karmabhir ātmānaṃ piprīṣanti sa prīto 'laṃ phalāyeti śāstramaryādā iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1267: phalasaṃbandhecchayā karmabhir yāgadānahomādibhir indriyādidevatāmukhena tattadantaryāmirūpeṇāvasthitam indrādiśabdavācyaṃ paramātmānaṃ bhagavantaṃ vāsudevam ārirādhayiṣanti,
GSP33ramvaspu:1268: sa hi karmabhir ārādhitas teṣām iṣṭāni phalāni prayacchatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1269: tathā ca śrutiḥ iṣṭāpūrtaṃ bahudhā jātaṃ jāyamānaṃ viśvaṃ bibharti bhuvanasya nābhir iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1271: tadviśvaṃ bibharti indrāgnivaruṇādisarvadevatāsaṃbandhitayā pratīyamānaṃ tattadantarātmatayāvasthitaḥ paramapuruṣaḥ svayam eva bibharti svayam eva svīkaroti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1272: bhuvanasya nābhiḥ brahmakṣatrādisarvavarṇapūrṇasya bhuvanasya dhārakaḥ tais taiḥ karmabhir ārādhitas tattadiṣṭaphalapradānena bhuvanānāṃ dhāraka iti nābhir ityuktaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1273: agnivāyuprabhṛtidevatāntarātmatayā tattacchabdābhidheyo 'yam evety āha tad evāgnis tadvāyus tatsūryas tad u candramā iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1275: yo yo yām yāṃ tanuṃ bhaktaḥ śraddhayārcitum icchati /
GSP33ramvaspu:1276: tasya tasyācalāṃ śraddhāṃ tām eva vidadhāmy aham //
GSP33ramvaspu:1277: sa tasya śraddhayā yuktas tasyārādhanam īhate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1278: labhate ca tataḥ kāmān mayaiva vihitān iha tān // iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1279: yāṃ yāṃ tanum itīndrādidevatāviśeṣās tattadantaryāmitayāvasthitasya bhagavatas tanavaḥ śarīrāṇītyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1280: ahaṃ hi sarvayajñānāṃ bhoktā ca prabhur eva ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:1281: ityādi / prabhur eva ceti sarvaphalānāṃ pradātā cetyarthaḥ / yathā ca
GSP33ramvaspu:1283: yaiḥ svadharmaparair nātha narair ādādhito bhavān /
GSP33ramvaspu:1284: te taranty akhilām etāṃ mayām ātmavimuktaye //
GSP33ramvaspu:1285: iti / setihāsapurāṇeṣu sarveṣv eva vedeṣu sarvāṇi karmāṇi sarveśvarārādhanarūpāṇi,
GSP33ramvaspu:1286: tais taiḥ karmabhir ārādhitaḥ puruṣottamas tattadiṣṭaṃ phalaṃ dadātīti tatra tatra prapañcitam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1287: evam hi sarvaśaktiṃ sarvajñaṃ sarveśvaraṃ bhagavantam indrādidevatāntaryāmirūpeṇa yāgadānahomādivedoditasarvakarmaṇāṃ bhoktāraṃ sarvaphalānāṃ pradātāraṃ ca sarvāḥ śrutayo vadanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1288: caturhotāro yatra saṃpadaṃ gacchanti devair ityādyāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1291: devaiḥ saṃpadaṃ gacchanti devaiḥ saṃbandhaṃ gacchanti yajñā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1292: antaryāmirūpeṇāvasthitasya paramātmanaḥ śarīratayāvasthitānām indrādīnāṃ yāgādisaṃbandha ity uktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:1296: sa eva cābhilaṣitaphalapradāteti kim atrāpūrveṇa vyutpattipathadūravartinā vācyatayābhyupagatena kalpitena vā prayojanam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1297: evaṃ ca sati liṅādeḥ ko 'yam arthaḥ parigṛhīto bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:1298: yaja devapūjāyām iti devatārādhanabhūtayāgādeḥ prakṛtyarthasya kartṛvyāpārasādhyatāṃ vyutpattisiddhāṃ liṅādayo 'bhidadhatīti na kiṃcid anupapannam
GSP33ramvaspu:1299: kartṛvācināṃ pratyayānāṃ prakṛtyarthasya kartṛvyāpārasaṃbandhaprakāro hi vācyaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1302: api ca kāminaḥ kartavyatā karma vidhāya karmaṇo devatārādhanarūpatāṃ taddvārā phalasaṃbhavaṃ ca tattatkarmavidhivākyāny eva vadanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1303: vāyavyaṃ śvetam ālabhata bhūtikāmo vāyur vai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vāyum eva svena bhāgadheyenopadhāvati sa evainaṃ bhūtiṃ gamayatītyādīni /
GSP33ramvaspu:1304: nātra phalasiddhyanupapattiḥ kāpi dṛśyata iti phalasādhanatvāvagatir aupādānikīty api na saṃgacchati /
GSP33ramvaspu:1305: vidhyapekṣitaṃ yāgādeḥ phalasādhanatvaprakāraṃ vākyaśeṣa eva bodhayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1306: tasmād brāhmaṇāya nāpaguretety atrāpagoraṇaniṣedhavidhiparavākyaśeṣe śrūyamāṇaṃ niṣedhyasyāpagoraṇasya śatayātanāsādhanatvaṃ niṣedhavidhyupayogīti hi svīkriyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1307: atra punaḥ kāminaḥ kartavyatayā vihitasya yāgādeḥ kāmyasvargādisādhanatvaprakāraṃ vākyaśeṣāvagatam anādṛtya kim ity upādānena yāgādeḥ phalasādhanatvaṃ parikalpyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1308: hiraṇyanidhim apavarake nidhāya yācate kodravādilubdhaḥ kṛpaṇaṃ janam iti śrūyate tad etad yuṣmāsu dṛśyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1310: coditāny anutiṣṭho vihitaṃ karmākurvato ninditāni ca kurvataḥ sarvāṇi sukhāni duḥkhāni ca paramapuruṣānugrahanigrahābhyām eva bhavanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1311: eṣa hy evānandayati atho so 'bhayaṃ gato bhavati atha tasya bhayaṃ bhavati bhīṣāsmād vātaḥ pavate bhīṣodeti sūryo bhīṣāsmād agniś candraś ca mṛtyur dhāvati pañcamaḥ iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1312: etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ etasya vā
GSP33ramvaspu:1313: akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi dadato manuṣyāḥ praśaṃsanti yajamānaṃ devā darvīṃ pitaro
GSP33ramvaspu:1315: yathoktaṃ dramiḍabhāṣye tasyājñayā dhāvati vāyur nadyaḥ sravanti tena ca kṛtasīmāno jalāśayāḥ samadā iva meṣavirsapitaṃ kurvantīti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1316: tatsaṃkalpanibandhanā hīme loke na cyavante na sphuṭante /
GSP33ramvaspu:1318: sa bhagavān vardhayeta vidvān karmadakṣa iti ca / (126)
GSP33ramvaspu:1319: paramapuruṣayāthātmyajñānapūrvakatadupāsanādivihitakarmānuṣṭhāyinas tatprasādāt tatprāptiparyantāni sukhāny abhayaṃ ca yathādhikāraṃ bhavanti
GSP33ramvaspu:1320: tajjñānapūrvakaṃ tadupāsanādivihitaṃ karmākurvato ninditāni ca kurvatas tannigrahād eva tadaprāptipūrvakāparimitaduḥkhāni bhayaṃ ca bhavanti
GSP33ramvaspu:1322: niyataṃ kuru karma tvaṃ karma jyāyo hy akarmaṇaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1323: ityādinā kṛtsnaṃ karma jñānapūrvakam anuṣṭheyaṃ vidhāya
GSP33ramvaspu:1325: iti sarvasya karmaṇaḥ svārādhanatām ātmanāṃ svaniyāmyatāṃ ca pratipādya
GSP33ramvaspu:1326: ye me matam idaṃ nityam anutiṣṭhanti mānavāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1328: ye tv etadabhyasūyanto nānutiṣṭhanti me matam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1330: iti svājñānuvartinaḥ praśasya viparītān vinindya punar api svājñānupālanam akurvatām āsur aprakṛtyantarbhāvam abhidhāyādhamā gatiś coktā
GSP33ramvaspu:1331: tān ahaṃ dviṣataḥ krūrān saṃsāreṣu narādhamān /
GSP33ramvaspu:1332: kṣipāmy ajasram aśubhān āsurīṣv eva yoniṣu //
GSP33ramvaspu:1333: āsurīṃ yonim āpannā mūḍhā janmani janmani /
GSP33ramvaspu:1334: mām aprāpyaiva kaunteya tato yānty adhamāṃ gatim // iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1337: iti ca svājñānuvartināṃ śāśvataṃ padaṃ coktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1338: aśrutavedāntānāṃ karmaṇy aśraddhā mā bhūd iti devatādhikaraṇe 'tivādāḥ kṛtāḥ karmamātre yathā śraddhā syād iti sarvam ekaśāstram iti vedavitsiddhāntaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:1342: vedāham etaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntam ādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:1344: tasya yathā kapyāsaṃ puṇḍarīkam evam akṣiṇī /
GSP33ramvaspu:1345: ya eṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśas tasminn ayaṃ puruṣo manomayo 'mṛto hiraṇmayaḥ manomaya
GSP33ramvaspu:1346: iti manasaiva viśuddhena gṛhyata ityarthaḥ sarve nimeṣā jajñire vidyutaḥ puruṣād
GSP33ramvaspu:1347: adhi vidyudvarṇāt puruṣād ityarthaḥ nīlatoyadamadhyasthā vidyullekheva bhāsvarā madhyasthanīlatoyadā
GSP33ramvaspu:1352: ākāśātmā sarvakāmā sarvakāmaḥ sarvagandhaḥ sarvarasaḥ sarvam idam abhyātto 'vākyānādaraḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1355: hrīś ca te lakṣmīś ca patnyau /
GSP33ramvaspu:1356: tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1358: yad ekam avyaktam anantarūpaṃ viśvaṃ purāṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:1359: yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ parame vyoman /
GSP33ramvaspu:1362: idaṃ tadakṣare parame vyoman nityādiśrutiśataniścito 'yam arthaḥ / (128)
GSP33ramvaspu:1363: tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam iti viṣṇoḥ parasya brahmaṇaḥ paraṃ padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūraya iti vacanāt sarvakāladarśanavantaḥ paripūrṇajñānāḥ kecana santīti vijñāyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1364: ye sūrayas te sadā paśyantīti vacanavyaktiḥ,
GSP33ramvaspu:1365: ye sadā paśyanti te sūraya iti vā /
GSP33ramvaspu:1366: ubhayapakṣe 'py anekavidhānaṃ na saṃbhavatīti cet / na /
GSP33ramvaspu:1368: yathoktaṃ tadguṇās te vidhīyerann avibhāgād vidhānārthe na ced anyena śiṣṭā iti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1369: yathā yadāgneyo 'ṣṭākapāla ityādikarmavidhau karmaṇo guṇānāṃ cāprāptatvena sarvaguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:1370: karma vidhīyate tathātrāpi sūribhiḥ sadā dṛśyatvena viṣṇoḥ paramasthānam aprāptaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:1372: karaṇamantrāḥ kriyamāṇānuvādinaḥ stotraśastrarūpā japādiṣu viniyuktāś ca prakaraṇapathitāś
GSP33ramvaspu:1373: cāprakaraṇapathitāś ca svārthaṃ sarvaṃ yathāvasthitam evāprāptam aviruddhaṃ brāhmaṇavad
GSP33ramvaspu:1377: niyuktārthaprakāśanāṃ ca devatādiṣv aprāptāviruddhaguṇaviśeṣaprtipādanaṃ viniyogānuguṇam eva /
GSP33ramvaspu:1383: kiṃ punaḥ siddhavastuny eva tātparye vyutpattisiddha iti sarvam upapannam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1384: nanu cātra tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam iti parasvarūpam eva paramapadaśabdenābhidhīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1385: samastaheyarahitaṃ viṣṇvākhyaṃ paraṃ padam ityādiṣv avyatirekadarśanāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:1390: yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ parame vyoman nityādiṣu paramasthānasyaiva darśanam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1391: tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam iti vyatirekanirdeśāc ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:1392: viṣṇvākhyaṃ paramaṃ padam iti viśeṣaṇād anyad api paramaṃ padaṃ vidyata iti ca tenaiva jñāyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1393: tad idaṃ parasthānaṃ sūribhiḥ sadādṛśyatvena pratipādyate / (129)
GSP33ramvaspu:1397: tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūraya iti parasthānam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1403: trīṇy apy etāni paramaprāptatvena paramapadaśabdena pratipādyante /
GSP33ramvaspu:1408: ta ime satyāḥ kāmā anṛtāpidhānā iti bhagavato guṇagaṇasya tirodhāyakatvenānṛtaśabdena svakarmaṇaḥ pratipādanam / (130)
GSP33ramvaspu:1409: anṛtarūpatirodhānaṃ kṣetrajñakarmeti katham avagamyata iti cet /
GSP33ramvaspu:1411: yathā kṣetrajñaśaktiḥ sā veṣṭitā nṛpa sarvagā //
GSP33ramvaspu:1416: kṣayantam asya rajasaḥ parāka iti rajataḥśabdena triguṇātmikā prakṛtir ucyate kevalasya rajaso 'navasthānāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:1417: imāṃ triguṇātmikāṃ prakṛtim atikramya sthite sthāne kṣayantam vasantam ityarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1418: anena triguṇātmakāt kṣetrajñasya bhogyabhūtād vastunaḥ parastād viṣṇor vāsasthānam iti gamyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1420: puruṣaṃ mahāntam ādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastād ityatrāpi tamaḥśabdena saiva prakṛtir ucyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1422: rajasaḥ parāke kṣayantam ityanenaikavākyatvāt tamasaḥ parastād vasantaṃ mahāntam ādityavarṇaṃ puruṣam ahaṃ vedety ayam artho 'vagamyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1424: yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ parame vyoman /
GSP33ramvaspu:1425: tadakṣare parame vyomann iti tatsthānam avikārarūpaṃ paramavyomaśabdābhidheyam iti ca gamyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1426: akṣare parame vyoman nityasya sthānasyākṣaratvaśravaṇāt kṣararūpādityamaṇḍalādayo na paramavyomaśabdābhidheyāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1428: yatra rṣayaḥ prathamajā ye purāṇā ityādiṣu ca ta eva sūraya ity avagamyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1429: tadviprāso vipanyavo jāgṛvāṃsaḥ samindhate viṣṇor yatparaṃ padam ityatrāpi viprāso medhāvinaḥ,
GSP33ramvaspu:1431: jāgṛvāṃsaḥ askhalitajñānās ta evāskhalitajñānās tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ sadā stuvantaḥ samindhata ityarthaḥ / (132)
GSP33ramvaspu:1432: eteṣāṃ parijanasthānādīnāṃ sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ityatra jñānabalāiśvaryādikalyāṇaguṇagaṇavatparabrahmasvarūpāntarbhūtatvāt
GSP33ramvaspu:1434: eṣām api kalyāṇaguṇaikadeśatvād eva sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ity atredam iti śabdasya
GSP33ramvaspu:1438: heyasvabhāvaṃ sarvaṃ pratiṣidhya satyakāma ityanena svabhogyabhogopakaraṇajātasya
GSP33ramvaspu:1442: tena pareṇa brahmaṇā svabhogyatadupakaraṇādayaḥ svābhimatā ye kāmyante te satyāḥ nityā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1443: anyasya līlopakaraṇasyāpi vastunaḥ pramāṇasaṃbandhayogyatve saty api vikārāspadatvenāsthiratvād tadviparītaṃ sthiratvam eṣāṃ satyapadenocyate
GSP33ramvaspu:1444: satyasaṃkalpa ityeteṣu bhogyatadupakaraṇādiṣu nityeṣu niratiśayeṣv ananteṣu satsvapyapūrvāṇām aparimitānām arthānām api saṃkalpamātreṇa siddhiṃ vadati /
GSP33ramvaspu:1445: eṣāṃ ca bhogopakaraṇānāṃ līlopakaraṇānāṃ cetanānām acetanānāṃ sthirāṇām asthirāṇām ca tatsaṃkalpāyattasvarūpasthitipravṛttibhedādi sarvaṃ vāti satyasaṃkalpa iti / (133)
GSP33ramvaspu:1447: tau te medhāvinau dṛṣṭvā vedeṣu pariniṣṭhitau /
GSP33ramvaspu:1458: samastāḥ śaktayaś caitā nṛpa yatra pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1464: viṣṇor dehānurūpāṃ vai karoty eṣātmanas tanum //
GSP33ramvaspu:1465: ekāntinaḥ sadā brahmadhyāyino yogino hi ye /
GSP33ramvaspu:1466: teṣāṃ tatparaṃ sthānaṃ yad vai paśyanti sūrayaḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:1467: kalāmuhūrtādimayaś ca kālo na yadvibhūteḥ pariṇāmahetuḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:1471: gaccha prabho rakṣa cāsmān prapannān kalpe kalpe jāyamānaḥ svamūrtyā //
GSP33ramvaspu:1472: kālaḥ sa pacate tatra na kālas tatra vai prabhuḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1473: iti / parasya brahmaṇo rūpavattvaṃ sūtrakāraś ca vadati antas taddharmopadeśād iti (134)
GSP33ramvaspu:1484: sa ca nikhilajagadudayavibhavalayalīlo nirastasamastaheyaḥ samastakalyāṇaguṇagaṇanidhiḥ svetarasamastavastuvilakṣaṇaḥ paramātmā paraṃ brahma nārāyaṇa ity avagamyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1485: taddharmopadeśāt sa eṣa sarveṣāṃ lokānām īṣṭe sarveṣāṃ kāmānām sa eṣa sarvebhyaḥ pāpabhya udita ityādidarśanāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:1486: tasyaite guṇāḥ sarvasya vaśī sarvasyeśānaḥ apahatapāpmā vijara ityādi satyasaṃkalpa ityantam viśvataḥ paramaṃ nityaṃ viśvaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ harim
GSP33ramvaspu:1488: vākyakāraiś caitatsarvaṃ suspaṣṭam āha hiraṇyamayaḥ puruṣo dṛśyata iti prājñaḥ sarvāntaraḥ syāl lokakāmeśopadeśāt tathodayāt pāpmanām ityādinā
GSP33ramvaspu:1489: tasya ca rūpasyānityatādi vākyakāreṇaiva pratiṣiddham syāt tadrūpaṃ kṛtakam anugrahārthaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:1490: taccetanānām aiśvaryād ity upāsitur anugrahārthaḥ paramapuruṣasya rūpasaṃgraha iti pūrvapakṣaṃ kṛtvā,
GSP33ramvaspu:1492: yathā jñānādayaḥ parasya brahmaṇaḥ svarūpatayā nirdeśāt svarūpabhūtaguṇās tathedam api rūpaṃ śrutyā svarūpatayā nirdeśāt svarūpabhūtam ityarthaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:1493: bhāṣyakāreṇaitad vyākhyātam añjasaiva viśvasṛjo rūpaṃ tat tu na cakṣuṣā grāhyaṃ manasā tv akaluṣeṇa sādhanāntaravatā gṛhyate,
GSP33ramvaspu:1494: na cakṣuṣā gṛhyate nāpi vācā manasā tu viśuddheneti śruteḥ,
GSP33ramvaspu:1495: na hy rūpāyā devatāyā rūpam upadiśyate,
GSP33ramvaspu:1497: mahārajanaṃ vāsaḥ vedāham etaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntam ādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastād iti prakaraṇāntaranirdeśāc ca sākṣiṇa ityādinā hiraṇyamaya iti rūpasāmānyāc candramukhavat,
GSP33ramvaspu:1498: na mayaḍ atra vikāram ādāya prayujyate,
GSP33ramvaspu:1501: brahmety avagamyata evam ādityavarṇaṃ puruṣam ityādinirdeśāt svābhimatasvānurūpakalyāṇatamarūpaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:1503: tathāsyeśanā jagato viṣṇupatnī hrīś ca te lakṣmīś ca patnyau sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:1504: tamasaḥ parastāt kṣayantam asya rajasaḥ parāka ityādinā patnīparijanasthānādīnāṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:1506: yathāha bhāṣyakāra yathābhūtavādi hi śāstram iti / (136)
GSP33ramvaspu:1507: etaduktaṃ bhavati yathā satyaṃ jñānaṃ anantaṃ brahmeti nirdeśāt paramātmasvarūpaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:1509: tathā yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavit parāsya śaktir vividhaiva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñānabalakriyā
GSP33ramvaspu:1510: ca tam eva bhāntam anubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvam idaṃ vibhātītyādinirdeśān niratiśayāsaṃkhyeyāś
GSP33ramvaspu:1512: tathādityavarṇam ityādinirdeśād rūpaparijanasthānādayaś ca sakaletaravilakṣaṇāḥ svāsādhāraṇā anirdeśyasvarūpasvabhāvā iti / (137)
GSP33ramvaspu:1513: vedāḥ pramāṇaṃ ced vidhyarthavādamantragataṃ sarvam apūrvam aviruddham arthajātaṃ yathāvasthitam eva bodhayanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1514: prāmāṇyaṃ ca vedānām autpattikas tu śabdasyārthena saṃbandha ityuktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1516: yathā ca cakṣurādīnām indriyāṇāṃ buddhiviśeṣajanaśaktiḥ svābhāvikī tathā śabdasyāpi bodhanaśaktiḥ svābhāvikī /
GSP33ramvaspu:1517: na ca hastaceṣṭādivat saṃketamūlaṃ śabdasya bodhakatvam iti vaktuṃ śakyam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1519: yāni saṃketamūlāni tāni sarvāṇi sākṣād vā paraṃparayā vā jñāyante /
GSP33ramvaspu:1521: teṣu ca sākṣād vā paraṃparayā vā saṃketo jñāyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1522: gavādiśabdānāṃ tv anādyanusaṃdhānāvicchede 'pi saṃketājñānād eva bodhakatvaśaktiḥ svābhāvikī /
GSP33ramvaspu:1523: ato 'gnyādīnāṃ dāhakatvādiśaktivad indriyāṇāṃ bodhakatvaśaktivac ca śabdasyāpi bodhakatvaśaktir āśrayaṇīyā // (138)
GSP33ramvaspu:1524: nanu cen indriyavac chabdasyāpi bodhakatvaṃ svābhāvikaṃ saṃbandhagrahaṇaṃ bodhakatvāya kim ity apekṣate,
GSP33ramvaspu:1525: liṅgādivad iti ucyate yathā jñātasaṃbandhaniyamaṃ dhūmādyagnyādivijñānajanakaṃ tathā jñātasaṃbandhaniyamaḥ śabdo 'py arthaviśeṣabuddhijanakaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:1526: evaṃ tarhi śabdo 'py arthaviśeṣasya liṅgam ity anumānaṃ syāt naivam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1527: śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandho bodhyabodhkabhāva eva dhūmādīnāṃ tu saṃbandhāntara iti tasya saṃbandhasya jñānadvāreṇa buddhijanakatvam iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1528: evaṃ gṛhītasaṃbandhasya bodhakatvadarśanād anādyanusaṃdhānāvicchede 'pi saṃketājñānād bodhakatvaśaktir eveti niścīyate / (139)
GSP33ramvaspu:1529: evaṃ bodhakānāṃ padasaṃghātānāṃ saṃsargaviśeṣabodhakatvena vākyaśabdābhidheyānām uccāraṇakramo yatra puruṣabuddhipūrvakas te pauruṣeyāḥ śabdā ity ucyante /
GSP33ramvaspu:1530: yatra tu taduccāraṇakramaḥ pūrvapūrvoccaraṇakramajanitasaṃskārapūrvakaḥ sarvadāpauruṣeyās te ca vedā ity+ucyante /
GSP33ramvaspu:1531: etad eva vedānām apauruṣeyatvaṃ nityatvaṃ ca yatpūrvoccāraṇakramajanitasaṃskāreṇa tam eva kramaviśeṣaṃ smṛtvā tenaiva krameṇoccāryamāṇatvam
GSP33ramvaspu:1532: te cānupūrvīviśeṣeṇa saṃsthitā akṣararāśayo vedā ṛgyajuḥsāmātharvabhedabhinnā anantaśākhā vartante /
GSP33ramvaspu:1533: te ca vidhyarthavādamantrarūpā vedāḥ parabrahmabhūtanārāyaṇasvarūpaṃ tadārādhanaprakārādhitāt phalaviśeṣaṃ ca bodhayanti /
GSP33ramvaspu:1535: vedānām anantatvād duravagāhatvāc ca paramapuruṣaniyuktāḥ paramarṣayaḥ kalpe kalpe
GSP33ramvaspu:1536: nikhilajagadupakārārthaṃ vedārthaṃ smṛtvā vidhyarthavādamantramūlāni dharmaśāstrāṇītihāsapurāṇāni ca cakruḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1537: laukikāś ca śabdā vedarāśer uddhṛtyaiva tattadarthaviśeṣanāmatayā pūrvavat prayuktāḥ pāraṃparyeṇa prayujyante /
GSP33ramvaspu:1538: nanu ca vaidika eva sarve vācakāḥ śabdāś cec chandasyaivaṃ bhāṣāyām evam iti lakṣaṇabhedaḥ katham upapadyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1539: ucyate teṣām eva śabdānāṃ tasyām evānupūrvyāṃ vartamānāṃ tathaiva prayogaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1540: anyatra prayujyamānānām anyatheti na kaścid doṣaḥ / (140)
GSP33ramvaspu:1545: sarvaṃ khalv idaṃ brahma aitadātmyam idaṃ sarvaṃ tat tvam asi śvetaketo
GSP33ramvaspu:1546: enam eke vadanty agniṃ maruto 'nyo prajāpatim /
GSP33ramvaspu:1547: indram eke pare prāṇam apare brahma śāśvatam //
GSP33ramvaspu:1548: jyotīṃṣi śuklāni ca yāni loke trayo lokā lokapālās trayī ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:1549: trayo 'gnayaś cāhutayaś ca pañca sarve deva devakīputra eva //
GSP33ramvaspu:1550: tvaṃ yajñas tvaṃ vaṣaṭkāras tvam oṃkāraḥ paraṃtapaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1551: ṛtudhāmā vasuḥ pūrvo vasūnāṃ tvaṃ prajāpatiḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:1552: jagatsarvaṃ śarīraṃ te sthairyaṃ te vasudhātalam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1553: agniḥ kopaḥ prasādas te somaḥ śrīvatsalakṣaṇaḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:1554: jyotīṃṣi viṣṇur bhuvanāni viṣṇur vanāni viṣṇur girayo diśaś ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:1555: nadyaḥ samudrāś ca sa eva sarvaṃ yad asti yan nāsti ca vipravarya //
GSP33ramvaspu:1556: ityādisāmānādhikaraṇyaprayogeṣu sarvaiḥ śabdaiḥ sarvaśarīratayā sarvaprakāraṃ brahmaivābhidhīyata iti coktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1557: satyasaṃkalapaṃ paraṃ brahma svayam eva bahuprakāraṃ syām iti saṃkalpyācitsamaṣṭirūpamahābhūtasūkṣmavastu
GSP33ramvaspu:1558: bhoktṛvargasamūhaṃ ca svasmin pralīnaṃ svayam eva vibhajya tasmād bhūtasūkṣmād vāstuno
GSP33ramvaspu:1559: mahābhūtāni sṛṣṭvā teṣu ca bhoktṛvargātmatayā praveśya taiścid adhiṣṭhitair mahābhūtair
GSP33ramvaspu:1560: anyonyasaṃsṛṣṭaiḥ kṛtsnaṃ jagad vidhāya svayam api sarvasyātmatayā praviśya paramātmatvenāvasthitaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:1562: yad idaṃ mahābhūtasūkṣmaṃ vastu tad eva prakṛtiśabdenābhidhīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1566: so 'kāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti tatsṛṣṭvā tad evānupraviśat tad anupraviśya sac
GSP33ramvaspu:1567: ca tyac cābhavan niruktaṃ cāniruktaṃ ca nilayanaṃ cānilayanaṃ ca vijñānaṃ cāvijñānaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:1568: ca satyaṃ cānṛtaṃ ca satyam abhavad iti pūrvoktaṃ sarvam anayaiva śrutyā vyaktam / (141)
GSP33ramvaspu:1573: sukhaṃ ca jñānaviśeṣasādhyaṃ padārthāntaram iti hi laukikāḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1575: yena jñānaviśeṣeṇa tatsādhyam ity ucyate sa eva jñānaviśeṣaḥ sukham / (142)
GSP33ramvaspu:1578: yena ca viṣayaviśeṣeṇa viśeṣitaṃ jñānaṃ sukhasya janakam ity abhimataṃ tadviṣayaṃ jñānam eva sukhaṃ,
GSP33ramvaspu:1581: evaṃvidhasukhasvarūpajñānasya viśeṣakatvaṃ brahmavyatiriktasya vastunaḥ sātiśayam asthiraṃ ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:1585: tad idam āha raso vai saḥ rasaṃ he evāyaṃ labdhvānandī bhavatīti brahmaiva sukham iti brahma labdhvā sukhī bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1586: paramapuruṣaḥ svenaiva svayam anavadhikātiśayasukhaḥ san parasyāpi sukhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33ramvaspu:1588: brahma yasya jñānaviṣayo bhavati sa sukhī bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1595: tathā hi sarveṣām eva cetanānāṃ svātantryam eva iṣṭatamaṃ dṛśyate,
GSP33ramvaspu:1597: sarvaṃ paravaśam duḥkhaṃ sarvam ātmavaśaṃ sukham /
GSP33ramvaspu:1599: sevā śvavṛttir ākhyātā tasmāt tāṃ parivarjayet /
GSP33ramvaspu:1601: tathā hi śarīraṃ hi manuṣyatvādijātiguṇāśrayapiṇḍabhūtaṃ svatantraṃ pratīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1610: ātmā jñānamayo 'mala iti smṛter jñānaikākāratā pratipannā /
GSP33ramvaspu:1611: patiṃ viśvasyetyādi śrutiguṇaiḥ paramātmaśeṣataikākāratā ca pratītā /
GSP33ramvaspu:1614: ata eva teṣām alpatvam asthiratvaṃ ca paramapuruṣasyaiva svata eva sukhatvam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1615: atas tad eva sthiram anavadhikātiśayaṃ ca kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma ānando brahma satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahmeti śruteḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1616: brahmavyatiriktasya kṛtsnasya vastunaḥ svarūpeṇa sukhatvābhāvaḥ karmakṛtatvena cāsthiratvaṃ bhagavatā parāśareṇoktam
GSP33ramvaspu:1618: vastv ekam eva duḥkhāya sukhāyerṣyāgamāya ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:1619: kopāya ca yatas tasmād vastu vastvātmakaṃ kutaḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:1622: evam anekapuruṣāpekṣayā kasyacit sukham eva kasyacid duḥkhaṃ bhavatītyavasthāṃ pratipādya,
GSP33ramvaspu:1623: ekasminn api puruṣe na vyavasthitam ityāha
GSP33ramvaspu:1624: tad eva prīyate bhūtvā punarsuḥkhāya jāyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1625: tad eva kopāya yataḥ prasādāya ca jāyate //
GSP33ramvaspu:1626: tasmād duḥkhātmakaṃ nāsti na ca kiṃcit sukhātmakam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1627: iti sukhaduḥkhātmakatvaṃ sarvasya vastunaḥ karmakṛtaṃ na vastusvarūpakṛtam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1629: yat tu sarvaṃ paravaśaṃ duḥkham ityuktaṃ tatparamapuruṣavyatiriktānāṃ parasparaśeṣaśeṣibhāvābhāvāt tadvyatiriktaṃ prati śeṣatā duḥkham evetyuktam
GSP33ramvaspu:1630: sevā śvavṛttir ākhyātety atrāpy asevyasevā śvavṛttir evetyuktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1631: sa hy āśramaiḥ sadopāsyaḥ samastair eka eva tv iti sarvair ātmayāthātmyavedibhiḥ sevyaḥ puruṣottama eka eva /
GSP33ramvaspu:1635: itīyam eva bhaktirūpā sevā brahmavid āpnoti param tam evaṃ vidvān amṛta iha bhavati brahma veda brahmaiva bhavatītyādiṣu vedanaśabdenābhidhīyata ityuktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1636: yam evaiṣa vṛṇute tena labhya iti viśeṣaṇād yam evaiṣa vṛṇuta iti bhavagatā varaṇīyatvaṃ pratīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:1638: yasya bhagavaty anavadhikātiśayā prītir jāyate sa eva bhagavataḥ priyatamaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1640: priyo hi jñānino 'tyartham ahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1641: iti / tasmāt parabhaktirūpāpannam eva vedanaṃ tattvato bhagavatprāptisādhanam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1643: na saṃdṛśo tiṣṭhati rūpam asya na cakṣuṣā paśyati kaścanainam /
GSP33ramvaspu:1644: bhaktyā ca dhṛtyā ca samāhitātmā jñānasvarūpaṃ paripaśyatītīha //
GSP33ramvaspu:1645: dhṛtyā samāhitātmā bhaktyā puruṣottamaṃ paśyati sākṣātkaroti prāpnotītyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:1647: bhaktiś ca jñānaviśeṣa eveti sarvam upapannam / (145)
